GSP33nysu__1u:8: vyāptiryasya nije nijena mahasā pakṣe sapakṣe sthitirvyāvṛttiśca vipakṣato 'tha viṣaye saktinar vai bādhite /

GSP33nysu__1u:39: viśiṣṭate vastvebhiriti viśeṣā asādhāraṇadharmā aśeṣāśca te viśeṣāśca /

GSP33nysu__1u:65: apauruṣeyatvena tanmūlatvena vānāśaṅkitadoṣatvādinā śobhanāni vākyāni vedādīni brahmasūtrādīni ca suvākyāni tairakhilairāpyatamam /
GSP33nysu__1u:67: yadi vyācikhyāsitena brahmamīmāṃsāśāstreṇa tannirṇetavyārthena vedādinā ca pratipādya iti nārāyaṇo vandanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:68: hanta tarhi tata eva dharmādikaṃ prāṇādikaṃ vā vandanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:78: na cāntareṇa lakṣaṇaṃ vastunirdhāraṇamityato vibhavādanekāni nārāyaṇasya lakṣaṇānyanenocyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:79: tatra nikhiletyanena nikhilaguṇatvaṃ pūrṇaguṇatvaṃ svato guṇaikadehatvaṃ ceti vipakṣābhedena trīṇi lakṣaṇānyuditāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:89: nikhiletyādyuktalakṣaṇopapannatayā nārāyaṇaḥ kena pramāṇena pratipattavya ityataḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:106: athavā nāyaṃ nārāyaṇaśabdo ḍitthādiśabda iva bhagavati sāṅgetiko ghaṭādiśabda iva vā rūḍhimātrapravṛttaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:117: tṛtīyasūtreṇa tatra śāstraṃ pramāṇamabhidhāya tasyādhyāyaśeṣeṇa tadviṣayatopapāditā /

GSP33nysu__1u:128: anvapi punarapi praṇamya bhaktayādyupetatālakṣaṇena prakarṣeṇa natvāhaṃ paramākhyavidyāyā brahmamīmāṃsāśāstrarūpāyā vyākhyāṃ karomīti sambandhaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:133: bhāve vā pūrvaśloka eva bahuśaḥ sannamāmīti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:140: yo hi yacchāstre pravartate tasya tatprabhāvo gururiti prasiddhameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:142: jagata etacchāstrapravaktṛṇāṃ brahmādīnāmañjasā mukhyatayā na tu vayo 'dhikatvādimātreṇa gurum /
GSP33nysu__1u:144: prakārāntareṇa gurutvaṃ nārāyaṇasya samarthayate- viśeṣata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:146: viśeṣata iti sākṣādupadeṣyṛtvena na tu jagata iva paramparayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:147: atra yadi śāstraprabhavamityādyevocyeta tadā pṛthakpraṇāmena devatāyā gurośca pārthakyaśaṅkā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:170: tadbhāve 'pi tathāvidhavākyāntaraparityāgenāsyaiva vyākhyāne kāraṇaṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkānirāsāya paramākhyavidyetyuktam / *1,88*
GSP33nysu__1u:172: asti tāvadasmingranthe“dve vidye veditavye parā caivāparā ca';
GSP33nysu__1u:184: tathāpi svapraṇītabhāṣyeṇaiva kṛtavyutpādanamidaṃ śāstramiti kimanena vyutpādanenetyato 'nvapi cetyāha /
GSP33nysu__1u:193: yaduktaṃ nārāyaṇo 'sya śāstrasya prabhava iti tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:199: paraśabdasyānekārthatvena vidyāśabdasya cārthavivakṣāvirahiṇyapi mantre prayogadarśanena paravidyākhyāyāḥ sarvottamaprāmāṇyāniścāyakatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:200: kiñceyaṃ paravidyākhyaitadviṣayetyatrāpi na niyāmakamastītyata āha- prādurbhūta iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:202: prādurbhūto na tu jāto granthamimaṃ cakra ityanena nārāyaṇasya śāstraprabhavatve
GSP33nysu__1u:204: dṛśyante hi kevalaṃ kṛpāpāravaśyena paropakārāya pravartamānāḥ sutarāṃ tairarthitāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:205: ata eva paraprayojanamapyātmagāmīva manyamānasya bhagavataḥ śāstrapraṇayanamiti jñāpayitumātmanepadaprayogaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:207: paravidyākhyayā asya sarvottamaprāmāṇyasiddhiṃ vyutpādayituṃ paravidyākhyamityanūdyānuttamaṃ śāstramiti vyākhyātam /
GSP33nysu__1u:212: iti vidyādvayamuddiśya tatrāparetyādinā sāṅgānvedānaparavidyātvenoktavā“atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate';
GSP33nysu__1u:220: tadyathā paramadhārmika ityabhihite paramatvaṃ dharmeṇeti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:235: tā eva paramā vidyā yadā viṣṇostu vācakāḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:237: brahmamīmāṃsāśāstravyutpāditanyāyānupakṛtā hi vedādayo viṣṇoravācakāstadukṛtāśca tasya vācakā bhavantīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:238: tathāpi kevalasya na paravidyātvaṃ labhyata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:245: evaṃ tāvadāgamenāsya śāstrasyānuttamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasādhyādhunānumānato 'pi tat siṣādhayiṣurādau tāvatprāmāṇyamātre anumānaṃ vaktumāha- gururiti
GSP33nysu__1u:246: yato yatkāraṇaṃ bādarāyaṇo gurūṇāṃ jagatastattvopadeśakānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ gururupadeṣyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:247: yataśca śāstrāṇāṃ vedānāṃ bhāratādīnāṃ ca yathāsambhavaṃ prabhavo gurūṇāmaśeṣārthapratipādakānāṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:248: savistarāṇāṃ vedādiśāstrāṇāṃ gururmukhyaprabhavo na tu sampradāyamātrapravartaka iti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:250: taduditaṃ tena bādarāyaṇenopadiṣyamidaṃ śāstramato mānaṃ bhavitumarhati / *1,114*
GSP33nysu__1u:252: atra gururgurūṇāmityādihetūnāṃ vaktṛśrotṛprasaṅgānāmānukūlyānyeva sākṣātsādhyāni mānasīti tu paramasādhyanirdeśa iti jñātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:254: vivakṣitārthatattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ vivakṣā ceti trayaṃ vakturānukūlyaṃ nāma /
GSP33nysu__1u:257: tatra gurūṇāṃ gururiti vakturbādarāyaṇasya vivakṣitārthatattvajñānasādhane hetuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:258: yo hi yasya tattvopadeṣyā sa tato 'dhikatattvajñānavānupalabdhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:259: ayaṃ ca sarvajñakalpānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ tattvopadeṣyā brahmarudrādideveṣvityādyāgamādavagataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:261: gurūṇāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ guruḥ prabhava ityanenāpi tattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ ca sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:262: yo hi yāvadatharpratipādakasyāgamasya prabhavaḥ sa tāvantamarthaṃ tattvato jānannavagataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:265: yaśca bahorāgamasya prabhavaḥ so 'sati nimittāntare paṭukaraṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:266: ayaṃ cāparasya vedādeḥ prabhavaḥ kathamapaṭukaraṇo bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:269: nahi svayaṃ tattvajñānāyogyaḥ pareṣāṃ tattvopadeṣyā dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:275: nanvatra gururgurūṇāmityādīnāṃ śāstraprāmāṇyena yathāśruta eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo vyākhyāyatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:280: yadyapi caite pratyekaṃ bauddhāgamādau mānatāṃ vyabhicaranti /

GSP33nysu__1u:320: tena siddhayā'ptavākyatayā mānamidaṃ śāstramiti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ / *1,132*
GSP33nysu__1u:331: pramāṇadṛṣṭeti viśeṣaṇe 'pi pramāṇadṛṣṭasya pramādādinānyathākathake api prasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:332: pramāṇena yathā dṛṣṭaṃ tathā vādīti cenna /

GSP33nysu__1u:355: yo yasya sutaḥ sa tadīyaṃ dhanaṃ arhatītyādau sārvatrikavyavahārahetutopalambhāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:358: yathā cānanugatasyāpi nāvyāptiḥ sārvatrikavyavahārahetutā ca tathā sāmānyaparīkṣāyāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ / *1,145*
GSP33nysu__1u:360: etena nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vakteti lakṣaṇadvayamapi samāhitaṃ veditavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:363: vipralipsā ca śrotṛprasaṅgānukūlataikanibandhanā tadabhāve nivartata iti vaktrādyānukūlyavattāyā āptavākyatayā susthaḥ pratibandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:365: nahi nāṭakādiprabandhaṃ viracayannapi kadāciduktalakṣaṇopapanno na bhavati bhavabhūtiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:377: anukūlavaktrādimattayā āptavākyatāsādhane vaktrānukūlyasyāptyekadeśatvena sādhyāviśiṣṭatā ca syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:378: vaktṛśrotṛprasaktīnāmiti vākyaṃ tu śaṅkitasya upādheḥ sādhanavyāpakatāpradarśanārthaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:382: nahi upādhiṃ dūṣayatā sādhanavyāpakatāṃ vyutpādya sādhanenopādheḥ pakṣe sādhanaṃ vidhāya tena sādhyaṃ sādhanīyamiti kuladharmaḥ / *1,152*
GSP33nysu__1u:383: upādheḥ sādhanābhedaṃ pradarśya tena sādhyaṃ sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:391: anyathā yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo 'pi na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:394: yadā tu nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vaktā āpta ityāśritaṃ tadā sādhyaviśiṣṭatāyāḥ śaṅkaiva nāsti / *1,156*
GSP33nysu__1u:398: anyathāstu vaktrādyānukūlyaṃ vakturvipralipsāmūlatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ ca bhavatvityāśaṅkāyāḥ ko nivārayitā /
GSP33nysu__1u:399: yadyapi prāmāṇyaṃ svata eveti bādarāyaṇīyaṃ matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:404: evaṃ vijātīyasaṃvādenāsya śāstrasya prāmāṇyamupapādya tadanuttamatāsiddhaye sajātīyadvayasaṃvādamapyāha- śrutīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:407: yathā āptavākyatayā tathā śrutimūlatayāpītyupamārtho vā tathāśabdaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:409: tathāpyatra sāmānārthatāsāmyena gaupyā vṛttyā śrutiyuktisaṃvāditārthau vyākhyeyau /
GSP33nysu__1u:436: brahma vedastadarthaḥ parabrahma vā tasya sūtrāṇi brahmasūtrāṇi /
GSP33nysu__1u:437: sakalavedārthabhūtasya parabrahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ svarūpanirṇayārthāni sūtrāṇīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__1u:439: etenaitacchāstravācinaḥ śārīrakaśabdasya śarīrameva śarīrakaṃ tatra bhavaḥ śārīrako jīvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:440: tamadhikṛtya kṛto 'yaṃ granthaḥ śārīraka iti vyākhyānaṃ nirastaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:442: tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyabrahmarūpatā mīmāṃseti vyākhyānādavirodha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:453: yata evaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ trividhaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:456: āptavākyatrayādiliṅgatrayāvasitaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ anyatrāpi cetsyāttadā kathameṣāṃ tadanuttamamityato brahmasūtrāṇāmevetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:477: tacca yāvadyāvadadhikaṃ pramīyate tattadanusāriṇīmaviśaṅkāṃ kṣiprapravṛttiṃ prasūta ityanubhavasiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:482: svayaṃ kṛtāpi tadvayākhyā kriyate spaṣṭatārthataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.7 //
GSP33nysu__1u:484: tadevaṃ śrutyanumānābhyāmidameva śāstraṃ pramāṇatamaṃ nānyadetādṛśamastītyupasaṃharati- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:490: nanu cāsya śāstrasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ sūtrakāra eva prathamasūtre samarthayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:503: tathāpi nedaṃ vyākhyātavyaṃ vyākhyātatvādityatrānvapi ceti yat prayojanāntaraṃ astīti sūcitaṃ tadvivaraṇārthamāha- svayamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:504: yadyapi teṣāṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ vyākhyā svayaṃ mayaiva bhāṣye kṛtā tathāpi punaratra spaṣṭataivārthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya spaṣṭatārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:516: yataḥ saṅkṣepavistarābhyāmuktaṃ śrotṛṇāṃ sugrahaṃ saprayojanaṃ ca bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:526: śāstraprabhavaṃ ityādibhirbahubhiḥ prakārairyadgurutvopapādanaṃ tena gurūṃśceti bahuvacanāntaṃ padaṃ vivṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:530: nirupapadasūtragrahaṇena yadbrahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaprāmāṇyaṃ sūcitaṃ tadupapādanaṃ paramākhyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:534: yasmādāptimūlatvādiyuktayāpi brahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ samarthayituṃ etaditi darśayati gururgurūṇāmityādineti / *1,179*
GSP33nysu__1u:537: maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi khalu karmāṇi nirantarāyaṃ parisamāpyante pracīyante ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:542: śrutiniścite tu sādhyasādhanabhāve tadabhāve 'pi bhāvo 'nekakāraṇakatvasya kalpako bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:545: nahi sāmagrīvaikalyena sādhyaṃ vyabhicaran heturahetuḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:547: nahi pratibaddhaṃ kāryaṃ ajanayat kāraṇamakāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:559: naca pratyakṣāderatrāvakāśa iti śrutireva śiṣyācāramūlaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:563: naca bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya vighnā eva na santīti tatparihārārthānanuṣṭhānaṃ na doṣāyeti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:565: yato maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi śāstrāṇi vīryavanti bhavantyāyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:568: kiṃ nāma granthādau na niveśitamityapi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:590: anyathādhikāriviṣayavaidhuryeṇa śāstrasya anārambhaṇīyatvaśaṅkā na nirākṛtā syādityanarthakaṃ sūtramāpadyetetyata āha- tatreti //
GSP33nysu__1u:596: tatra prathamasūtre 'vayavatayā sarvaśāstrasya cāṅgatayā ceṣyate 'ṅgīkriyate sūtrakṛteti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:601: yatparyāyāntaraṃ vihāyānayoreva kramāntaraṃ vihāyādāvevopādānaṃ tena jānīmo jñāpakatayā'disūtrasya kārakatayā samastaśāstrasya copayogitvenaitau sūtrakṛtā vivakṣitāviti /
GSP33nysu__1u:607: atra yatpareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ“maṅgalasya vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:610: sa ca vācyo vā lakṣyo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:611: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ lakṣyaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:613: naca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śābde vyavahāre dṛṣṭaḥ'; /
GSP33nysu__1u:635: evaṃcāyamoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā maṅgalārthatayā sūtrādāvupanibaddha ityanupapannamityata āha- sarvatra iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:636: akhilaiḥ sūtrapāṭhakaiḥ yatpṛthagasaṃhitatayoṅkriyate tatsarvatra sūtreṣvanugatatvenābhilaṣitena nimittenopapadyate / *1,208*
GSP33nysu__1u:641: iti śrautārthavādasāmarthyātsarvāsvapi brahmavidyāsvādyantayoroṅkārasyohaḥ kartavya iti gamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:645: tasya saṃhitatayā nirdeśe prathamasūtrāvayava evāyaṃ vijñāyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:647: naca vyākhyānato 'pyadhikāro jñāyata iti vyarthaṃ pṛthakkaraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:649: tadanenāsaṃhitatayā nirdeśe nimittāntaraṃ vadatā hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā bhavati / *1,218*
GSP33nysu__1u:650: nanu ca śrautārthavādabalenādyantayoroṅkārasyoho vā prāṅmukhatvādivadbahirbhūtasyaiva uccāraṇaṃ vā vidheyatvena kalpyamiti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:653: vakṣyamāṇanyāyenoṅkārārthasya prathamasūtravākyārthe samanvayena niścayopapattau bādhitaviṣayaṃ cānumānamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:657: labdhena sarvatrānugatatvena kāraṇenaivopapadyata ityanena dṛṣṭānte sādhakasya hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā /
GSP33nysu__1u:661: ca prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛtterārambhaṇīyatāsiddhaye prekṣāvataḥ pravartayituṃ prayojanādyabhisambandhaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:664: nanu brahmajñānasya mokṣahetutā yadi śāstrapravṛtteḥ prāgeva pramāṇāntarasiddhā vyarthaṃ tadā tadabhidhānaṃ śāstre /
GSP33nysu__1u:666: athehaiva tanniścayastadā pravṛttau prayojanādiniścayo niścite ca prayojanādau pravṛttirityanyonyāśrayatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:671: evameva tatra pravṛttāvuttaratrāpi tathātvaprasaṅgādanarthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:680: naca mumukṣuṇā anapekṣite svarge yāgādikaṃ tatsādhanatayā nānubhūyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:681: puruṣātharsādhane tu icchālakṣaṇā prayatnalakṣaṇā vā pravṛttistathā na svarasasiddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:683: tasmādyo yatra pravartanīyaḥ sa tatprayojanādikaṃ darśayitvaiva iti sārthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānam / *1,236*
GSP33nysu__1u:685: uktaṃ ca prayojanādikaṃ śrotā kataṃ śraddadhītāśraddadhānaśca kathaṃ pravarteteti punaravaśiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:688: yadyapi āptatvāvadhāraṇe prayojanādyanabhidhāne 'pi tatsāmānyaniścayo bhavatyeva prayojanādimadidaṃ śāstraṃ āptoktatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:692: saca prayojanādiviśeṣo vacanādevāvasīyata iti sārthakaṃ tadabhidhānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:694: nanu sandehaḥ prayojanādyavacane 'pi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve sati sulabha eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:698: yo hi yadvacanātpravartate sa tadvacanādeva viśeṣasmṛtimapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:700: nahi rogārto mamedaṃ roganivṛttisādhanaṃ na veti yatra tatrocchṛṅkhalaḥ svayaṃ utprekṣya pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:714: yadi tāvadāptavākyatayā sūtramidaṃ prayojanāderniścāyakaṃ syāttadā'gamatayā nyāyasūtratvahāniḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:715: kiñcāptatvaṃ sūtrakṛto yena vedādinā pramāṇenāvagantavyaṃ tenaiva prayojanādyabhisambandho 'pi śāstrasyāvagamyata iti vyarthaṃ tadabhidhānamāpadyeta
GSP33nysu__1u:717: nahi kaścitprayojanādisandehe 'timahāyāsasādhye pravartate prāguktānarthaparamparāśca kathaṃ na śaṅketa /
GSP33nysu__1u:718: tasmānnedaṃ prayojanādyupadeśamātraṃ kintu śrautasya prayojanādeḥ nyeyenopapādanārthamityeva parihāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:719: āptatvaṃ tu nyāyasyopodbalakamātramiti bhāṣyakārīyaṃ tadvyutpādanamapi nānarthakam /
GSP33nysu__1u:739: yadīdaṃ śāstraṃ pareṇopalabhyeta tadoktasandehakāraṇopapattau prayojanārthitvena viśeṣasmṛtimataivaṃ sandihyeteti sūtrakṛta eva parakīyasambhāvitasaṃśayāharaṇopapatteḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:742: nahi vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ taddvārabhūtanyāyanibandhanaṃ ca nārambhaṇīyamiti sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:746: etacchāstravyutpādanīyanyāyakaraṇikāyāṃ jijñāsāyāṃ ubhayavidhavyāpāradarśanādviśeṣādarśanācca saṃśayaḥ kiṃ kartavyā na veti /
GSP33nysu__1u:747: nanu ca tadvijijñāsasva iti jijñāsāyāḥ śrutivihitatvāt kathaṃ viśeṣādarśanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:754: kṛṣṭādikaṃ hi sati viṣayabhūte bhūmyādau prayojane ca sasyādhigamādāvadhikāriṇi ca kṛṣīvalādau kartavyamupalabdham /
GSP33nysu__1u:755: sā ca vyāpikā vyāvartamāneto vyāpyāmapi kartavyatāṃ vyāvartayatīti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:756: viṣayaśūnyatvāddhi samanaskendriyasannikṛṣṭasya sphītālokamadhyavartino ghaṭasya na jijñāsā kriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:758: sambandhavaidhuryāddhi saprayojanaṃ saviṣayamapi śabdajñānamarthayamāno na vaidyake pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:777: evaṃ tarhi tata eva na jijñāsyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:778: ata evānāditastadīyatattvajñāne vidyamāne 'pi iṣyāniṣyaprāptiparihārayoradarśanānnāsau jijñāsitaḥ kasyacitprayojanasyeṣye / *1,272*
GSP33nysu__1u:780: nanvayaṃ kartā bhoktā doṣasaṃsargī cāhaṃpratyaye prakāśate /
GSP33nysu__1u:788: yatkvacicchāstre 'pi laukikapravedanīyārthavyutpādanamanuvādo 'sau na punaḥ sa eva pradhānavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:795: jīvasya cāhamiti svaprakāśatayā svaprakāśajñānāśrayatayā mānasapratyakṣavedyatayā vā siddhatvena na jijñāsāviṣayatvamityuktam / *1,276*
GSP33nysu__1u:816: svataḥ prāmāṇyāṅgīkāre tu vedaviruddhānāmapi śākyādivacasāṃ tathātvāpātena punarvedāpramāṇyatādavasthyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:821: prayojanaṃ ceśvarajijñāsayā abhyudayo vā syāt mokṣo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:828: jijñāsā ca mokṣasādhanaṃ bhavantī kiṃ sākṣāduta jñānadvāreṇa /
GSP33nysu__1u:842: atha parāmārtha evāyaṃ bandhastarhi na jñānena nivarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:848: śarīrādyabhāve ca tatsādhyasukhābhāvena kasyāpi tatrārthitānupapatteranadhikārikaṃ śāstramāpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:849: ko hi svasthātmā sahasā sukhatatsādhane hātumutsahate /
GSP33nysu__1u:852: śāstraṃ cedamanārambhaṇīyamiti prāpte sūtrayāmāsa bhagavānācāryaḥ- oṃ athāto brahmajijñāseti // *1,288*
GSP33nysu__1u:860: atra yaduktaṃ jīvavyatirikta īśvara eva nāstīti tatparihārāya sūtrakṛtoṅkārabrahmaśabdau prayuktau /
GSP33nysu__1u:868: nahi padaṃ cakṣurādivadapratīta evārthe pratītiṃ janayati yenāpūrvamarthaṃ padaprayogādeva pratīmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:870: kintu sannihitānekavākyārthasāmarthyāllabhyata ityata āha bhāṣyakāraḥ- otatvavācīti // *1,291*
GSP33nysu__1u:879: tathāca yadyasau karmāṇi tadā karturyadi vā kartari tadā karmaṇo 'pekṣāyāmupapadādyabhāve
GSP33nysu__1u:884: tathā ca pūrvavadyogyatayā “atha kasmāducyate brahmeti bṛhanto hyasmin guṇāḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:901: yatpunarakāravācyena tatpadārthenokāravācyasya tvaṃpadārthasyābhedo makāreṇocyate brahmaśabdena ca sakalastvātmakatvalakṣaṇapūrṇatābhidhīyata iti vyākhyānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:935: na cālaukikārthakalpane gauravaprasaṅgādvaraṃ kathañcideṣāṃ śabdānāṃ jīvādiviṣayāṅgīkaraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:942: tathāca śrautaṃ brahmādiśabdaṃ jīvādiviṣayamaṅgīkurvāṇenāpi niravagrahapūrṇatāyuktaṃ kiñcidabhidheyaṃ mukhyamaṅgīkaraṇīyameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:946: sa eva bhargaśabdārtho vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca bhūmataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:947: bhāvanāccaiva sutvācca so 'yaṃ puruṣa ityapi // MAnuv_1,1.10 //
GSP33nysu__1u:956: vedasyeśvaraviṣayatā kuta ityato 'pyoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā brahmaṇi prayuktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:962: ataḥ sa eva vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca bhūrādīnāmartha iti gamyate“praṇavārthā vyāhṛtayaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:968: kena nimittena vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca sa evārtha ityata āha- bhūmata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:983: kimato na hi vyāhṛtaya eva veda iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:986: nanu gāyatṛyāṃ yo bhargo no 'smākaṃ dhiyaḥ pracodayātprerayettasya saviturdevasya tadvareṇyaṃ rūpaṃ dhīmahi cintayāma iti bharganāmakaḥ savitā pratipādyo dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:987: tatkathaṃ bhagavatparatvamityata āha- sa eva bhargaśabdārtha iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:999: nanu puruṣasūkte puruṣasya paśorhiraṇyagarbhasya vā pratipādanātkathaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ pratipādyata ityata āha- so 'yamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1002: “sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣṛpuriṣayo nainena kiñcanānāvṛtaṃ nainena kiñcanāsaṃvṛtam'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1005: siddhe ca puruṣasūktārthatve viṣṇoḥ kiṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1007: sa eva sarvavedārtho jijñāsyo 'yaṃ vidhīyate // MAnuv_1,1.11ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:1014: ityādiśrutisiddhamapi bhagavataḥ sarvavedārthatvaṃ nyāyenopapādayitumayaṃ prayatnaḥ sūtrakārasya /
GSP33nysu__1u:1017: yo yadvayākhyeyārthaḥ sa tadartho yathā sampratipanna iti vā sarvo veda īśvaraparastatparoṅkāravyākhyānatvāditi vā sākṣādevānumānaṃ kiṃ na vyākhyāyate
GSP33nysu__1u:1018: “tadyathā sarvāṇi parṇāni śaṅkunā santṛṇṇānyevamoṅkāreṇaiva sarvā vāk santṛṇṇā';
GSP33nysu__1u:1021: tathāpi vākyāntarabalena na sarvā vāgoṅkāravyākhyānaṃ sākṣātkiṃ nāmoktaprakāreṇa paramparayaiveti jñāpayitumitthaṃ vyākhyānamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1022: nanu ceśvare pramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭavata oṃkārabrahmaśabdāveva kasmānnoktau kiṃ vedānumānena /
GSP33nysu__1u:1032: ayamiti uktavidhayā jīvajaḍātmakātprapañcādatyantaviviktatvena niścitatayā viṣayabhūtaḥ sarvavedārthatayā śakyapratipādanaścetyarthaḥ / *1,333*
GSP33nysu__1u:1039: na hi bījasyāṅkuraṃ janayataḥ sahakāriṇo jalāderaṅkuro na kāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1047: tatra kartṛvyāpārasya karaṇavyāpāravyavadhānena vṛkṣakarmateva mīmāṃsāvyāpārasyāpi pramāṇādisambhāvanāddhāreṇeśvarāvabodha evoddeśya iti bhavati tatkarmatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1063: tathāpi pratibandhanivṛttau satyāmeva nirṇaya iti pratibandhakanirāsahetorapi vicārasyopacāreṇa nirṇayahetutvādupapannamīśvaraviṣayatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1065: īśvarasya vedapramāṇakatve tata eva niścitatvātkiṃ mīmāṃsayeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1069: apare tu tadaṅgīkṛtyāpi tadvācināṃ padānāṃ jīvādiviṣayatāṃ vyākurvantastadabhāvamasthitāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1070: anye tu punarastīśvaraḥ kintu paramārthato nirguṇa eveti saṅgirante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1071: eke tu saguṇo 'pi na jagataḥ kāraṇamapi tūdāsīna evetyātiṣṭhante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1075: kecidvigrahavantamityevamādyāsvanekāsu vipratipattiṣu satīṣu tattvajñānakaraṇādapi vedāttadanutpattau tadapanodanadvāreṇa vedetikartavyatārūpā jijñāsā kartavyeti / *1,340*
GSP33nysu__1u:1077: tatra tāvadbrahmaṇo jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti ṣaṣṭhīsamāso na punardharmāya jijñāsetivaccaturthīsamāsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1078: tādarthyasamāse prakṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti vārtikakṛtā prakṛtivikārabhāva eva caturthīsamāsasya niyamitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1087: jijñāsā khalu karmāpekṣā vinā karmaṇā na jñātuṃ śakyā na tu sambandhinaṃ vineti karmaṇaḥ prādhānyāttadeva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1090: evaṃ sati lakṣaṇādijijñāsāpi pratijñātā syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1097: iti karmāṇi ṣaṣṭhayāḥ samāsaḥ pratiṣidhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1101: athavā brahmaṇaḥ karmatvenāprādhānyaśaṅkāṃ nivartayituṃ jijñāsya iti karmaprādhānyaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1115: apare tu kāryaniṣṭha eva vedabhāgo vicāryatvena tatra prakrānto vicāritaśca na vastutattvaniṣṭha ityato vastutattvaniṣṭhaṃ vedabhāgaṃ vicārayitumidamārabhyata ityāhuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1118: dharmajijñāsāśāstraṃ tu vedaikadeśāmukhyārthadharmavicārāya pravṛttamityāśayena vā“sa eva bhargaśabdārthaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:1120: tatra sarvavedārtha ityanena gatārthatāśaṅkānirāsaḥ sa eva na tu kāryaśeṣatayetyādyaṃ samādhānaṃ sarveti dvitīyaṃ ca nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1124: jñānī priyatamo 'to me taṃ vidvāneva cāmṛtaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.11cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:1125: vṛṇute yaṃ tena labhya ityādyuktibalena hi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1129: brahmajijñāsāyā niṣprayojanatvaṃ śaṅkitamapākartuṃ ataḥśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe- jñānīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1140: yasmāttasya brahmaṇo nārāyaṇasya prasādātparamānugrahādeva mucyate saṃsārāt na tu karmādineti“tamevam'“yamevaiṣa vṛṇute';
GSP33nysu__1u:1143: tathāpi yamevaiṣa vṛṇuta iti śrutibalena gamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1145: tathāpi yamevaiṣa vṛṇuta iti vākyānurodhena tatrāpyanusandheyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1151: na punaḥ karmādineti jñānī priyatamastamevaṃ vidvānityuktibalenāvagamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1154: īśvarajñānaṃ ca tajjijñāsayaiva nānyeneti“ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:1155: iti paramātmadaśarnānuvādena tatsādhanatayā śrotavya ityādinā śravaṇādividhāyakoktibalena pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1159: yadyapi na jijñāsāyāḥ svargādirūpo 'bhyudayaḥ prayojanaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1171: siddhaṃ ca sādhanaṃ bhagavāniti mumukṣuṇā savyāpārīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1183: prasādo nāmecchāviśeṣo guṇāntaraṃ vā na naḥ kacit kṣatiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1189: nacāvyaktasvabhāvo bhagavāṃsahasreṇāpi prayatnānāṃ śakyaḥ sākṣātkartuṃ vinā tadanugrahāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1193: naca nididhyāsanaṃ vākyārthagrahaṇalakṣaṇe śravaṇe kṛte 'pi vinā mananāparanāmnā vicāreṇopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1197: ye tu dhyānameva paramapāṭavāpannamaparokṣākāramiti manyante teṣāṃ darśanaśrutaya upacaritārthāḥ prasajyeran / *1,403*
GSP33nysu__1u:1211: evaṃca vicāro yato jñānasādhanaṃ jñānaṃ ca mokṣasādhanamato asau kartavya iti labhyate / *1,409*
GSP33nysu__1u:1213: īśvaraprasādasya tu jñāpakaṃ na kiñcidatra paśyāmaḥ / *1,418*
GSP33nysu__1u:1217: ātmayāthātmyājñānādanātmani śarīrādāvātmatvārope sati hi tadanukūlapratikūlayo rāgadveṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1220: tasmācca duḥkhānubhava ityanādirayaṃ kāryakāraṇapravāhaḥ saṃsāra ityucyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1226: tayorabhāve ca na pravṛtterutpattiḥ prāgupacitāyāścopabhogena prrakṣayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1229: janmābhāve ca na nirbījasya duḥkhasyotpāda ityevamātyantikī duḥkhanivṛttirmuktiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1235: dravyaṃ karma ca kālaśca svabhāvo jīva eva ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:1236: yadanugrahataḥ santi na santi yadupekṣayā // MAnuv_1,1.13 //
GSP33nysu__1u:1237: narte tvat kriyate kiñcidityāderna hariṃ vinā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1238: jñānasvabhāvato 'pi syānmuktiḥ kasyāpi hi kvacit // MAnuv_1,1.14 //
GSP33nysu__1u:1263: upapādayiṣyate hi jñānānandādisvarūpo 'yaṃ jīva iti puṃstvādivadityādinā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1271: ataḥ kāmakarmādyatiriktaṃ māyāvidyā prakṛtirityādiśabdābhidheyamanādyeva kimapi dravyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1280: ataḥ parameśvara eva sattvādiguṇamayyā vidyāvirodhitvenāvidyayā svādhīnayā prakṛtyācintyādbhutayā svaśaktayā ca jīvasya svaprakāśamapi svarūpacaitanyamācchādayatīti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1284: prasanna evāsau svakīyāṃ māyāṃ vyāvartayatīti tatprasādārthaṃ sarvo 'pyayaṃ sādhanasandarbha ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1285: tato yadyapi na sūtrākṣarebhyo bhagavatprasādo labhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1288: evamuktena nyāyena na jñānasyaivāyaṃ svabhāvo yatsākṣānmokṣasādhanatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1290: sakalakārakāṇāṃ tadadhīnasattāpravṛttitvena tadicchāṃ vinā kasyāpi kāryasyānudayāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1293: yena jñānasya mokṣahetutvamaṅgīkṛtaṃ na tenāpi īśvarecchāṃ tyaktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1298: ānandadaśca muktānāṃ sa evaiko janārdanaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.15 //
GSP33nysu__1u:1301: yaduktaṃ na kāryo mokṣaḥ kintu prācīneṣu mithyājñānādiṣu nivṛtteṣu kāraṇābhāvādevottarapravāhānutpādamātram /
GSP33nysu__1u:1311: kiñca loke tāvadanādiḥ prāgabhāvo nivartate sugatānāṃ tattvapatibhāvanāprakarṣeṇānādivāsanāsantānānāṃ nivṛttiriṣyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1332: tatra kiṃ nivartakābhāva upādhiranenocyate kiṃ vā nivartakasadbhāvena satpratipakṣatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1339: yadapi prāgabhāve vyabhicārodbhāvanaṃ tadapi bhāvatvena hetuviśeṣaṇādayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1355: svayameva hyanādibhāvarūpaṃ yadvijñānena vilīyata ityajñānalakṣaṇamabhidhāya bhāvarūpāmānasādhanāya pramāṇānyupanyastāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:1371: ādye dhūmavānagnimāniti sāmānyavyāpteḥ parvato niragnika iti viśeṣavyāptirbalavatī prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:1377: yadanādi tadajñānātiriktaṃ na nivartata iti saṅkocanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1378: na punaryadanāditvarahitaṃ tadeva jñānanivartyamiti saṅkocyamityatra niyāmakābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1382: vyāptibalenājñānasya jñānanivartyatve siddhe 'nāditvasya tatraiva vyabhicāra iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1385: anāditvenājñānasyānivatyartve siddhe 'jñānatvasya tatraiva vyabhicāra iti kiṃ na syāt / *1,442*
GSP33nysu__1u:1395: kiñca tu śuktikājñānaṃ nāma kiṃ jñānābhāvo 'tha bhāvarūpamajñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1406: yadapi nirupādānasya vināśānupapattimāśaṅkayoktaṃ svāśrayagatottarāvasthā vināśa iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1408: anupādānabhūtāśrayottarāvasthā cedāśritavināśaḥ syāttadā bhūtalādapasārite ghaṭe ghaṭavināśaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1409: paramāṇuśyāmatāpratibandī tu tasyā api sopādānatvenaiva nirasteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1411: yattāvadavidyāyā anāditvenānivṛttiriti so 'yaṃ prasaṅgaḥ svatantrānumānaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1423: etena nivartakābhāvasyopādhitvam tadviparyayasya pratipakṣatvaṃ ca samāhitam / *1,450*
GSP33nysu__1u:1424: nanvavayavatatsaṃyogavināśābhyāṃ dravyanāśo dṛṣṭastatkathamatra vināśa iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1445: sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇāṃ sadyaḥ śarīrādipāte vātaputrīyāḥ pauruṣeyā brahmopadeśāḥ prasajyeranniti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1450: yena so 'pi kathaṃ teṣāṃ neti paryanuyujyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:1451: bhakteḥ parāvasthā hi taddheturuktā tatsampattiśca kāryagamyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1461: vastutastu bhagavāneva anāderapi bandhasya nivartaka iti sādhūktaṃ“jñānināṃ mokṣadaśca saḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1470: tato 'vidyāyāṃ nivṛttāyāmapi nāśeṣānandābhivyaktiryāvadīśvara eva svakīyāṃ bandhaśaktiṃ na tato vyāvartayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1475: evaṃ tāvatsvamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya tatpariśuddhaye pareṣāṃ bhāṣyaṃ dūṣayati- bandhamithyātvamityādinā //
GSP33nysu__1u:1476: māyāvādinā hi kartṛtvabhoktṛtvadoṣasaṃsargakriyākārakaphalalakṣaṇasya bandhasyā'tmanyāropitatvena mithyātvaṃ svabhāṣyādau varṇitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1481: svapadāni ca varṇyante bhāṣyaṃ bhāṣyavido viduriti hi bhāṣyalakṣaṇamācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1485: tatrāthāto brahmajijñāsetisūtre anuvādatvaparihārāya śāstre puruṣapravṛttisiddhaye ca kartavyeti padamadhyāhāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1486: jijñāsāpadaṃ cānuṣṭhānayogyasyāntarṇītasya vicārasyopalakṣaṇamiti sthite sādhanacatuṣyayasampannasya brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtravākyasya śrauto 'rthaḥ sampadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1489: mokṣasādhanabrahmajñānāya vedāntavākyavicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtravākyasya tātparyeṇa
GSP33nysu__1u:1491: evaṃca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgatayā 'rthataḥ sūtritasya prayojanāderupapādakaṃ bandhamithyātvamiti tadapi sūtrārtha eva / *1,470*
GSP33nysu__1u:1498: tena sūtrakāreṇaiva brahmajñānamanarthahetunibarhaṇaṃ sūtrayatāvidcāhetukaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ pradarśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1501: tasya cāhaṃ kartā bhokteti pratīyamānaṃ rūpaṃ yadi paramārthikaṃ syāt tadāsandigdhatayā vicāraviṣayatā na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1503: pāramārthikaṃ niṣkrayaṃ niṣkalaṃ brahmarūpaṃ syāttato 'sya sandidhatayā viṣayatocyamānopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1504: tenātmasvarūpaṃ vicāraviṣayaṃ sūtrayatā sūtrakṛtaiva kartṛtvādyatadākārasya mithyātvaṃ sūtritaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1505: kartṛtvāderbandhasya mithyātvaṃ ca yāvatā vinā nopapadyate tadapi sūtritameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1517: ato yaḥ kaścid arthaḥ śabdasāmarthyenārthavaśādvā pratīyate sa sarvastadartha eveti bhavatyayamarthakalāpastanmahimādhigataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1528: asya śāstrasyaidaṃparyaṃ sukhaikatānasadātmakūṭasthacaitanyaikarasatāsaṃsāritvābhimatasyātmanaḥ pāramārthikaṃ svarūpamiti vedāntāḥ paryavasyantīti
GSP33nysu__1u:1529: taccāhaṃ kartā sukhī duḥkhīti pratyakṣābhimatenābādhitakalpenāvabhāsena viruddhayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1530: atastadvirodhaparihārārthaṃ brahmasvarūpapiparītarūpamavidyānimittamātmana iti yāvanna pratipādyate tāvajjaradgavādivākyavadanarthakaṃ pratibhāti
GSP33nysu__1u:1537: yatkhalu pramitamapyanupapadyamānaṃ svopapattaye yadapekṣate tattadākṣipati nānyat /
GSP33nysu__1u:1538: yathā jīvato devadattasya gṛhe 'bhāvo bahirbhāvaṃ na punaḥ śabdānityatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1541: evaṃca prayojanatayoktā muktiryadi bandhamithyātvāmapekṣeta tadā tadākṣipet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1550: yathā ca mithyābhūtasya svāpnanigaḍabandhasya prabodhenaiva sākṣāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1551: tatra brahmajñānātsaṃsārabandhanivṛttiḥ sūtritā kaṃ pakṣamavalambyatāmiti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1556: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ mucyata iti śrutirdarśanamokṣāvantarā kiñcinna sahata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1566: pramite ca sādhyasādhanabhāve kā nāmānupapattiryacchamanāyopapādakaṃ mṛgyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1567: nanu yathāgneyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ yāgānāmapūrvakāraṇabhāve śrute 'pi kālāntarabhāvipradhānāpūrvasādhanatvopapattyarthaṃ kramabhāviyāgajanyāni madhyavartīnyavāntarāpūrvāṇi kalpyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1568: yathā vā śrutasyaiva yāgasya svargasādhaśratvasyopapattaye 'pūrvaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1582: anādeścājñānasya nivṛttāvātmano 'pi nivṛttiḥ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1585: kvedamupalabdhaṃ bhavatā yatsatyaṃ na nivartata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1586: nivṛttāvanāditvamaprayojakīkṛtya mithyātvaṃ prayojakīkurvatājñānasya yena kenāpi nivṛttiḥ kasmānneṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1589: hanta tarhi virodhisadbhāva eva nivṛttau prayojaka iti kuta ātmanivṛttiḥ / *1,495*
GSP33nysu__1u:1591: nanu jñānena satyaṃ nivartamānaṃ kiṃ viṣayagataṃ nivartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1595: yataścitrāvayavini nīlaviśiṣṭadravyajñānaṃ svaviṣayaṃ vā svaviṣayasamavetaṃ vā rasādikaṃ virodhinaṃ vā pītimādiguṇaṃ na nivartayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1602: yadi jñānamāśrayagataṃ nivartayet tadā dharmādikamapi nivartayedityatra vyāptyayogāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1609: ekameva hi citraṃ nāma rūpamāśrayavyāpyavṛttīti padārthavidaḥ / *1,513*
GSP33nysu__1u:1611: astu vā jñānamajñānasyaiva nivartakamiti vyāptistathātrapa bandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1616: api ca satyasyāpi viṣasya garuḍadhyānena nivṛttidarśanādbandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1622: tarhi tadeva na jñānānnivṛttamiti na mithyābhūtasyāpi jñānānnivṛttiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1627: tato varaṃ sa eva prayojaka ityaṅgīkāro lāghavāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1634: yadi kriyāparispandaḥ sa tarhyatīndriyāśrito 'tīndriya ityaparokṣāvabhāsavirodho rūparahitatvena tadavabhāsavirodhaśca /
GSP33nysu__1u:1635: yadi ca mānasī sṛṣṭiriti matam anumatametat /
GSP33nysu__1u:1658: nanu yathā mithyābhūtācchaśaviṣāṇādervyāvṛttau dhvaṃsaḥ satye paryavasyatīti bhavatocyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1659: tathā satyāccidātmano 'pi vyāvṛttau mithyābhūte paryavasyatīti mayāpi vaktuṃ śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1660: satyamāpātatastathā tathāpyapi sautrī arthāpattiḥ sandehāskanditā kuṇṭhitaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1666: api caivam- uktirbrahmajñānaṃ jīvagataṃ bandhaṃ nivartayatīti sautrī prayojanoktirbandhamithyātvaṃ nāpekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1667: yadi jīvajñānaṃ jīvagatasya bandhasya nivartakamiti prayojanoktiḥ sūtre syāttadā kathañcidapekṣetāpi bandhamithyātvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1668: nacaivaṃ sūtrakṛdāha- nahi śuktikāyāmāropitaṃ rajataṃ ghaṭajñānānnivartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1669: brahmajñānaṃ nāma tvaṃpadārthasya jīvasya tatpadārthena brahmaṇaikyānubhava iti tu svagoṣṭhīniṣṭhaṃ pralāpamātram /
GSP33nysu__1u:1671: api ca yadi bandhamithyātvaṃ yadi ca jñānamātrādbandhabādhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1672: tadā jñāne sati kimapi muktirnaivāpekṣata iti sadya eva sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇāṃ śarīrādinivṛttiḥ prasajyetetyarthāpattestarkavirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1677: yadi hi sūtre jīvātmano viṣayatayoktiḥ syāttadā sā tasya sandigdhatāsiddhaye katṛtvādibandhamithyātvaṃ kathañcidapekṣetāpi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1686: eṣā hi brahmaṇyeva pramāṇābhāsapratipannasya jīvābhedādereva mithyātvamapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1687: yadi hi jīvasya brahmatāyāṃ sakalavedāntaparyavasānaṃ pratipādayitumidaṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttaṃ syāttadā virodhaśāntyai bandhamithyātvāpekṣā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1698: na kevalaṃ bandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate kiṃ nāma bandhasya mithyātvaṃ nāstītyapisambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1702: tathātve vā pramāṇavaiyarthyaṃ pūrvapramāṇasyāpi tathātvenānavasthā ca syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1705: evaṃ tarhi paricitacarapuruṣasya divābhuñjānasya pīnatvamanupapadyamānaṃ rasāyanasiddhiṃ yogarddhiṃ vā kasmānnākṣipet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1711: asiddhaṃ sādhayati pramāṇaṃ na tu pramāṇaviruddhamiti hi prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:1717: vayamapi hi bandhamithyātvamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣaviruddhatvādeva nārthāpattiprameyamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1721: ceṣyādiliṅgairahamityeva yo vedya ityādyāgamaiścātmanaḥ kartṛtvādyupetasyaiva pramitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1724: nanu pratyakṣaṃ bandhasvarūpamātraṃ gocarayati na tu tasmin mithyātvābhāvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1727: pratyakṣaṃ khalu bandhaṃ gocarayadastīti nāstīti vā gocarayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1738: na caitānyupakramādivaśādīdṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni kenāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33nysu__1u:1740: yeyaṃ caitanyasya svata eva sthitalakṣaṇabrahmarūpatāvabhāsaṃ pratibadhya jīvatpāpādikavidyākamarpūrvaprajñāsaṃskāracitrabhittiranādiranirvācyavidyā
GSP33nysu__1u:1742: saca cidātmano buddhayā niṣkṛṣṭa vedāntavādibhirantaḥkaraṇaṃ mano buddhirahaṃpratyayīti ca vijñānaśaktiviśeṣamāśritya gīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1746: tadevamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣe śrutyādivirodhena pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bandhamithyātvavyutpādanamupapannataramityata āha- mithyātvaṃ yadīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1759: ata eva hyasataḥ sadajāyatetyādivākyapratipanno 'rthaḥ kutastu khalu somyaiyaṃ syātkathamasataḥ sañjāyetetyupapattiviruddhastyajyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1762: evaṃ yadi duḥkhāderātmātiriktasya samastasya mithyātvaṃ śrutyādibalena syāttarhi tasya śrutyādivākyasya tāvanmithyātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1764: anyathā svasminnevāsya prāmāṇyaṃ pratihatamiti na kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1765: yadi cedaṃ vākyaṃ mithyā syāttathāpi na duḥkhādermithyātvaṃ pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1776: kriyājñāne prati kārakāntarāprayojyatvādilakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca parameśvarāyattamātmani svato vidyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1782: tāṃścātmano viviktānapi vispaṣṭatayānupalabhamānastaddharmānduḥkhādīṃtsatyānevātmīyatvena paśyaṃstatkṛte nīcoccatvalakṣaṇe vikṛtī satye eva pratipadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1783: tato rāgadveṣābhyāṃ prayuktastadvinivṛttaye yatkaroti tadapyetādṛgevātanotītyanekayoniṣu bambhramīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1784: na kvāpyātyantikaṃ tadupaśamaṃ labhate vinā paramapuruṣārādhanāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1788: atastannirākaraṇanirbandho yukta evetyetatparibhāvayituṃ bandhamithyātvamiti saṃmugdhe prastute 'pi duḥkhāderiti niṣkṛṣṭoktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1793: puraskṛtya sarve pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā laukikāḥ pravṛttāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi ityādinā
GSP33nysu__1u:1799: nacānenāntaḥkaraṇaśarīrendriyaviṣayāṇāṃ taddharmāṇāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ ca mithyātvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1837: na cāyamasti niyamo yatsmaryamāṇamaśeṣasambandhiviśeṣasahitaṃ smaryata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1840: vakṣyati ca sūtrakāraḥ saiva hi satyādaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1845: atrāpi yaḥ sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣa itivadvayakhyānamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1850: yatprakṛtipariṇāmavāci makārāntamavyayamahaṃpadaṃ na jātu tadātmani prayujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1851: yaccātmavāci dakārāntāsmacchabdajaṃ tanna kadācidapi māyāpariṇāme prayujyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1852: tadevaṃ sarvamithyātvaparatve śrutereva mithyātvaprasaṅgenāsādhakatvāpattau duḥkhādibandhamithyātvāsiddhayā na pratyakṣamatattvāvedakamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1858: vākyena sakṛdeva jātāyāḥ sakalamithyātvaviṣayāyā buddheḥ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāya parīkṣakabuddhaya eva tadviṣayaṃ buddhayā vibhajya krameṇāvagāhanta ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1860: mithyāyāḥ sādhakatvaṃ ca na siddhaṃ prativādinaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.17cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:1864: mayā mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvābhyupagamādityata āha- mithyāyā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1872: dvitīyastu satyasyaiva sādhakatvamiti manyamāno yadīdaṃ vākyaṃ sakalamithyātvaṃ pratipādayettadā sakalāntargatatvātsvayamapi mithyā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1875: yadi caitadvākyaṃ mithyā syānna kasyāpyarthasya sādhakaṃ syādityaniṣyaprasaṅgaṃ paśyankathaṃ tvadabhyupagamamātreṇa svatarkasya viruddhatāṃ pratipadyeteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1881: tatkimavidyamānasyāpi vākyasya nirdoṣapadāvayavatvādikaṃ vidyata iti vaktumudyato bhavān /
GSP33nysu__1u:1882: evaṃca vadatā bhavatā kasmiṃścana vipratipanne 'rthe vandhyāsutavacanaṃ pramāṇayantaṃ prativādinaṃ prati nūnaṃ padadoṣādikamevopapādya sādhakatvaṃ dūṣayiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1883: svarūpasyaivābhāvenāsādhakatve siddhe kiṃ tatra caramabhāvinyā padadoṣādicintayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1884: nahi śabde 'vidyamānatvenaiva cākṣuṣatvasyānityatvasādhakatvābhāve siddhe kiṃ tatra caramabhāvinyā padadoṣādicintayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1885: nahi śabde 'vidyamānatvenaiva cākṣuṣatvasyānityatvasādhakatvābhāve siddhe vyāpticintā kriyata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1890: vādināpi hi śrutivākyenātmātiriktasyākhilasya mithyātvaṃ pratipadya mithyābhūtasyāpi sādhakatvamiti pratipattavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1892: tathāca śruteḥ sarvamithyātvapratipādakatve mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvaṃ pratītya tadvirodhena tarko nirasanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1893: tannirāse ca śruteḥ sarvamithyātvapratipādakatvamityanyonyāśrayamanuttīrṇaḥ kathamasāvapi tarkasya viruddhatāṃ pratipadyeta / *1,592*
GSP33nysu__1u:1894: tacca mithyāpramāṇena satā vā sādhyate tvayā /
