GSP33nysu__1u:1900: mithyābhūtasya sādhakatvamityeṣo 'rthaḥ kutaḥ siddha iti mā vocaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1903: evaṃca pramāṇenaiva mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatve siddhe viruddhastarko na madabhyupagamamātreṇetyetaddūṣayituṃ vikalpena pṛcchati- tacceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1907: yadidaṃ mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvaṃ sādhayituṃ tvayā pramāṇadvayasamāhārātmakaṃ pramāṇamupanyasyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1910: yadyapi pareṇāṅgīcikīrṣitatvena prādhānyānmithyātvavikalpaḥ prathamaṃ praśnāvasare nirdiṣyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1911: tathāpi mithyāsatyayoḥ satyamarthataḥ pradhānamiti tatkrameṇa dūṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1912: satā cedityataḥ paramātmarūpeṇa tadanyena veti vikalpaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1924: yo hi yanmithyā na tatsādhakamiti vyāptimaṅgīkṛtya śrutermithyātve asādhakatvaṃ prasañjayati
GSP33nysu__1u:1926: tathāca asya pramāṇasya sādhakatve siddhe mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvamityarthasiddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1928: tataścāsya pramāṇasya sādhakatvasiddhiriti cakrakramaprasaṅgena naikasyāpi siddhiriti / *1,605*
GSP33nysu__1u:1930: nanu ca śrutiḥ svavyatiriktasya duḥkhādermithyātvaṃ pratipādayantī kathamupapattiviruddheti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1933: tarhi pramitaṃ vihāya mithyātvavādinī kathaṃ duḥkhādimithyātvamapi pratipādayet tasyāpi pratyakṣasiddhatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1944: nanu cātra śruteḥ pratyakṣavirodhamevopanyasya tatprābalyavyutpādanaṃ kuto na kṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1952: tathāpi mithyābhūto 'pi svāpno 'rthaḥ śubhāśubhayo rekhāropito varṇo 'rthasya pratibimbaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:1953: ca bimbasya sphaṭikalauhityaṃ copādhānasannidhānasya varṇadairghyādikaṃ cārthabhedasya
GSP33nysu__1u:1960: rekhāpi varṇe padamivārthe saṅketitā taṃ smārayatīti na kiñcidatra mithyāsti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1973: tasmātpadavākyapramāṇavidāmagresareṇa paramāstikena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇokto bhagavati svarūpabhedābhāva eva śrutyartho 'vadheyaḥ / *1,613*
GSP33nysu__1u:1981: bhavitṛprādhānye 'pi brahmaṇi nānābhūtāvayavaguṇakarmādiniṣedhe nānātvameva niṣiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2000: svīkṛtaṃ hyaviśeṣasya sādhyā sādhakatā punaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.19 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2004: nanu yathā bhavato mithyābhūtasya sādhakatvaṃ na saṃmatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2005: tathā mama satyasya sādhakatvaṃ na saṃmatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2008: tatra yathā mithyābhūtasya sādhakatvānabhyupagamena śrutermithyātve 'sādhakatvaprasaṅgānna bandhamithyātvasādhakatetyuktaṃ bhavatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2009: evaṃ mayāpi satyasya sādhakatvamanabhyupagacchatā vaktuṃ śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2018: sataḥ sādhakatvaṃ mayā na svīkṛtamityuktamiti cettatrāha- sādhakatvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:2023: māyāvādinā khalu bhāvarūpājñānaṃ siṣādhayiṣatā“pratyakṣaṃ tāvadahamajño māmanyaṃ ca na jānāmītyaparokṣāvabhāsadarśanāt';
GSP33nysu__1u:2026: evaṃca sākṣiṇājñānasiddhimicchatā pareṇa sataḥ sādhakatvaṃ svīkṛtameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2028: ato mayā sataḥ sādhakatvaṃ nāṅgīkṛtamiti na śakyate vaktum /
GSP33nysu__1u:2034: tato 'jñāne sati sākṣiṇaḥ sādhakatvasiddhistasyāṃ cājñānasiddhiriti kathaṃ netaretarāśrayatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2039: evamubhayavādisampratipannaṃ pramāṇaṃ svamate 'stīti darśayituṃ satyasya sākṣiṇo 'jñānasādhakatvaṃ parābhyupagatamupanyastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2041: bhāvarūpamajñānamanicchantaṃ prati hi tatra sākṣipratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamupanyastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2044: aviśeṣasya sādhakatā tu paraṃ prati tvayā sādhyaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2046: yatsādhakaṃ karaṇaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nityaṃ vā jñānaṃ tatsarvaṃ jātyādiviśeṣavat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2047: yacca nirviśeṣaṃ śaśaviṣāṇādi na tatsādhakamiti pareṇa niyamasyāṅgīkṛtatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2052: nirviśeṣasya prāmāṇyameva nopapadyata iti tadarthameva viśeṣānusaraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2057: prakāśāśrayaṃ tamaḥ prakāśenaiva siddhayatītyasyārthasyāviśeṣavādinā bhavatā paraṃ pratyupapādayitumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2067: anyathā śabdānityatve kṛtakatvamupanyasya pareṇānyatarāsiddhāvudbhāvitāyāṃ tatsādhanasphūrtimatāpi tūṣṇīṃ bhavitavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2068: ahaṃ cāviśeṣasya sākṣiṇaḥ sādhakatvaṃ vipratipattau sādhayiṣyāmīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2086: nanu cāviśeṣasya sādhyā sādhakateti prakṛtamataḥ sā ceti parāmarśo yuktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2088: tathāpi prāgyanmithyābhūtasyāpi sādhakatvaṃ pramāṇavikalpanirākaraṇena nirastaṃ tatsaviśeṣatvādivikalpanirākaraṇenāpi nirākaraṇīyamiti sūcanāya sāmānyena napuṃsakanirdeśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2089: etena prāgvikalpitaḥ satā'tmabhūteneti pakṣo 'pi nirasto veditavyaḥ / *1,643*
GSP33nysu__1u:2091: tasmād vyavahṛtiḥ sarvā satyetyeva vyavasthitā // MAnuv_1,1.21ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:2101: yadi caitanyātiriktaṃ samastaṃ mithyā syāttadā samastāntargataṃ kathāvyavahārāṅgabhūtaṃ pramāṇādikamapi mithyā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2102: tathāca viśvasatyatāmanaṅgīkurvatastanmithyātvamaṅgīkuvarto māyāvādino nirupāyasya kathakatā na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2105: viśvamithyātvamaṅgīkurvatāmapi cārvākāṇāṃ bauddhānāṃ ca vāditvopalambhādvayabhicāra iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2117: anyathātiprasaṅgamātrocchedaprasaṅgādityāśayavānuktasya prasaṅgatvaṃ sphuṭīkartuṃ viparyayaparyavasānamāha- pakṣabalābalacintā na syāt //
GSP33nysu__1u:2125: astu kathāṅgabhūtapramāṇādivyavahārasya satyatā duḥkhādibandhasya tu kimāyātamityata āha- vyāvahārikamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:2127: caśabdo na kevalaṃ vyavahāro vyāvahārikaṃ ceti sambaddhayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2128: nahi prameyaṃ nāstyasti ca pramāṇamiti sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2131: pramāṇādīnāṃ sattvaṃ yadabhyupetaṃ kathakena tatkasya hetoḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2135: ādye 'pi kiṃ vyavahāramātraṃ pramāṇādisattābhyupagamavyāptamuta sādhabādhanakṣamo vyavahāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2145: yato 'bhyupagamyāpi pramāṇasattāṃ pravartitā matāntarānusāribhirvyavahārā abhyupagatapramāṇādisattvairmatāntarānusāribhiraparaiḥ sādhanādyakṣamā iti kathyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2146: tena jñāyate vyavahārasya sādhanādyakṣamatāyāṃ sadvacanābhāsalakṣaṇayogitvameva prayojakam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2149: tadā vyavahāra eva dharmī kathaṃ siddhayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2153: na brūmo vayaṃ na santi pramāṇādīnīti svīkṛtya kathārabhyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2154: kiṃ nāma santi na santi pramāṇādīnītyasyāṃ cintāyāmudāsīnairyathā svīkṛtya tāni bhavatā vyavahriyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2156: kiñca kīdṛśīṃ maryādāmavalambya pravṛttāyāṃ kathāyāmidaṃ dūṣaṇamuktaṃ bhavatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2157: kiṃ pramāṇādīnāṃ sattvamupagamyobhābhyāṃ vādiprativādibhyāṃ pravartitāyāmutāsattvamabhyupetyāthaikena sattvamapareṇa cāsattvamaṅgīkṛtya /
GSP33nysu__1u:2169: naca vācyaṃ nedaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prativādinaṃ pratyucyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2170: kiṃ nāma śiṣyādayaḥ pramāṇādisattānabhyupagantuḥ kathānadhikāraṃ jñāpyanta iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2176: syādapyevaṃ yadi kathakapravartanīyavāgvyavahāraṃ prati pramāṇādīnāṃ hetutā tatsattānabhyupagame nivarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2178: tathā sati tatsattānabhyupagantṛṇāṃ vāgvyavahārasvarūpameva na niṣpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2184: kayāpi niyamasthityā pravṛttāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathakavāgvyavaharaṃ prati hetutvātpramāṇādīnāṃ sattvaṃ sattvāccābhyupagamo bhavatā prasādhyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2185: kathātaḥ pūrvaṃ tu tattvāvadhāraṇaṃ paraparājayaṃ vābhilaṣadbhayāṃ kathakābhyāṃ yāvatā vinā tadabhilaṣitaṃ na paryavasyati tāvadanuroddhavyam
GSP33nysu__1u:2186: tacca vyavahāraniyamasamayabandhādeva dvābhyāmapi tābhyāṃ sambhāvyata iti vyavahāraniyamameva badhnītaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2190: pramāṇādisattāmabhyupetyāpi tathāvidhavyavahāraniyamavyatirekeṇa kathāpravṛttiṃ vinā tattvanirṇayasya jayasya vābhilaṣitasya kathakayoraparyavasānāt
GSP33nysu__1u:2192: lokavyavahāro 'pi pramāṇavyavahāro vā syāt pāmarādisādhāraṇavyavahāro vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2199: tarhi pramāṇādisattāpi yadi vicārabādhyā bhaviṣyati tadā nābhyupeyaiva anyathā tūpagantavyeti lokavyavahārasiddhatayā sattvamabhyupagamyata iti tāvanna bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2219: kiṃ nāma yadi pramāṇādīni santi na syuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2222: teṣāṃ cāsādhakatve tatkāryo vyavahāro na niṣpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2229: māyāvādinaṃ tadvayavahāraṃ vā pakṣīkṛtya viśiṣṭavyavahārakartṛtvena viśiṣṭavyavahāratvena vā hetunā pramāṇādisattābhyupagantṛtve tatpūrvakatve vā sādhyamāne tatsyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2234: yadā hi pramāṇādisattā nābhyupagatā tadā tadasattvamevāṅgīkṛtamiti svarūpasiddhatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2236: nanvetadāśaṅkayoktaṃ na brūmo vayamityādi duruktaṃ tat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2241: yaśca tatsattāṃ pratītyāpi sattā'dyudāsīno 'hamiti manyate taṃ pratīdaṃ dūṣaṇamiti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2243: nahi vayaṃ pramāṇādisattābhyupagamaṃ kathāpravṛttikāraṇatayāvaśyaṃ tataḥ pūrvabhāvinaṃ brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2244: kiṃ nāma yo yathākathañcitkathāyāṃ pravṛttastaṃ vipakṣe kathānutpattiprasaṅgaṃ daṇḍaṃ pradarśya tatkāraṇānāṃ pramāṇādīnāṃ sattāmaṅgīkārayāmaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:2248: prativādinaḥ kathāpraveśamabhyupagamya tatra pravṛttaṃ prati pramitakathākāryabalena kāraṇapramāṇādisattāyā abhyupagantavyatvasyoktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2251: yena tatsattānabhyupagantṛṇāṃ vāgvyavahārasvarūpaṃ na niṣpadyeteti prasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2253: sā ca sattvābhāve nopapadyata iti tatsattvamaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2262: tatra kiṃ pramāṇādisattābhyupagame kalpanāgauravamuta tatsattābhyupagamasya kāraṇakoṭipraveśane /
GSP33nysu__1u:2273: kiṃ vicārasādhyaḥ pramāṇādisattābhyupagamo na vicārapravṛtteḥ kāraṇamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2274: kiṃ vā vicārabādhyatāyā eva pramāṇādisattābhyupagamaprayojakatvena vyavahārasyāprayojakatvamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2277: autsargikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bādhakādapodyata ityatradarśane tasyaiva prayojakatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2281: teṣāṃ ca taddhetutā nāsatāmupapadyata iti tatsattāvaśyamabhyupagamanīyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2287: pramāṇaivyarvahartavyamiti ca niyamabandhanaṃ pramāṇakaraṇabhāvasya niyamāntarbhāvānniyatapūrvasattvarūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ pramāṇānāmanādāya na paryavasyati
GSP33nysu__1u:2288: dūṣaṇānāṃ cāstitvena bhaṅgāvadhāraṇaniyamabandhane sādhanāṅgānāṃ ca vyāptyādīnāṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:2289: sattvena tadviṣayasya tattvarūpatāvvavahāraniyamanādau ca kaṇṭhoktayaiva tasya tasya
GSP33nysu__1u:2292: pramāṇādīnāṃ sattāmanabhyupagamya kathā'rambhaḥ śakyata ityevamāśaṅkaya yaduktametairapi
GSP33nysu__1u:2293: bādhakaiḥ kathāyāmārabdhāyāmabhimatasya prasādhanīyatvena pūrvoktabādhāyā na nistāraḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:2296: eva paryavasānamiti kathāyāṃ pravṛttaṃ svavyāghātamapyacetayantaṃ pratyasmābhirucyamānatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2297: nanu kathādeḥ kāryasya sattve kathañcitkāraṇasya pramāṇādeḥ sattvamaṅgīkaraṇīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2303: tato 'nyathāsiddhayā tarkasyābhāsatāsiddhistasyāṃ ca śrutyādiprāmāṇyasiddhiriti cakrakāpattyā naikasyāpi siddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2304: asataḥ kāraṇatvaṃ tu sūtrakṛtaiva nirākariṣyata ityalaṃ prasaṅgena / *2,46*
GSP33nysu__1u:2310: na caivaṃ kiṃ nāma vyāvahārikī sattābhyupagamyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2311: tathā ca sarvāntaḥpātino vyavahārasataḥ pramāṇādeḥ sādhakatvasambhavānnoktaprasaṅga ityata āha- vyavahārasataśceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:2315: vyavahārasato 'pi sādhakatvaṃ pūrvasyāsata iva prativādino na siddhameva yato 'to noktaprasaṅganistāra iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2317: yadi vyāvahārikaṃ sannāma sadeva tadā mithyātvapratipādanaṃ vyāhatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2323: tatra yasya sarvaprakāreṇa bādhitatvaṃ nāsti tanmukhyaṃ satpāramārthikamiti ca gīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2324: yasya tu satpratītireva sattā tadamukhyaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2330: dvitīye 'pi vādiprativādimadhyasthamāsyi tasyāpi kathākāla eva bādhitatvāvagamābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2334: puruṣatrayāvagatasyāpyekakṣaṇāvagatasya puruṣāntareṇa tenāpi kṣaṇāntare 'pi bahulaṃ bādhadarśanāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2342: naca pratīteḥ svarūpabhedo 'stītyato vijñānaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2351: tadevaṃ sattraividhyādambarādikaṃ viśvaṃ sadapi pāramārthikatvābhāvānmithyeti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2353: pāramārthikaprātītikavyāvṛttyarthatvena vyāvahārikapadaṃ ca sambhavatīti atredaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2354: kiṃ pāramārthikasadeva sadasacca bādhakabhedena dvividhamiti sattraividhyamuta satyevāntarabhedena /
GSP33nysu__1u:2361: yadapi tathaiva laukiko vyavahāraḥ pratīyata iti tadagre nirākariṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2365: prāktanniścayātparamārthasata evārthakriyeti manyamānaḥ prativādī kathaṃ bodhanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2368: sattraividhyaṃ ca mānena siddhayet keneti pṛcchyate // MAnuv_1,1.22cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:2373: kenetyasya paramārthasatā vā vyāvahārikasatā vā prātibhāsikasatā vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2376: yathā mithyābhūtasya sādhakatvaṃ kena siddhayediti pṛṣṭaṃ tatheti cārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2378: pṛcchāviṣayatvameva na doṣa ityata āha- tasyāpīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:2379: asataḥ sādhakatvasyeva tasya sattraividhyasyāpi kathañcana vikalpitapakṣeṣu kasmiṃścana pakṣe naiva siddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2394: tatra vyāvahārikasya prapañcasya sadasadvilakṣasya sadvilakṣaṇatvādupapannaṃ śrutyādinā mithyātvasamarthanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2404: viśvasya sadasadvailakṣaṇyaṃ kiṃ satā pramāṇena sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2411: nanvatra sadasadvailakṣaṇye sādhakatvaṃ na syāditi prasaṅgo vācyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2415: sattvābhāve sādhakatvaṃ na syāditi vā prasaṅgaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2430: asataścāpi viśvasya tenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.24 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2433: vivādapadaṃ sadasadvilakṣaṇaṃ jñānabādhyatvādyadevaṃ tadevaṃ yathā śuktirajatamityanumānaṃ viśvasya sadasadvilakṣaṇatve mānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2443: sato bhāvātmakasya viśvasyāsato 'bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhāvābhāvabhedavādino mama mate svayaṃ sadastyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2444: evamasato 'bhāvātmakasya viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2446: kiṃ nāmaivaṃ vibhāgena sadasadvailakṣaṇyasiddhayāpi pratijñātārthasiddherarthāntaratā parasya syāditi // 1 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2448: tadā sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvabhedavādino mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2450: asato 'bhāvādapi vailakṣaṇyaṃ sutarāṃ bhāvābhāvabhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2453: sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi sutarāṃ svayaṃ sadeveti tenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // 2 // *2,77*
GSP33nysu__1u:2455: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasyāsato 'bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamapi svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2456: asato 'bhāvasya viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamapi mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2458: yadi hi bhāve 'pyabhāvatvamabhāve 'pi bhāvatvamaṅgīkuryāṃ kutastadā bhāvābhāvabhedavādaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2459: tathāca kathaṃ tena sādhyamānenāniṣyaṃ mama bhavet // 3 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2461: tadā sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya bhāvābhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvābhāvarūpatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2467: na bhāvatvamapītyatastena sādhitenāniṣyaṃ mama kathaṃ bhavet // 4 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2468: athaikaikasya vastuno bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ ca sādhyatayā vivakṣitamiti manvīta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2469: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasyāsato 'bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2470: evamasato 'bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2480: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2485: evamasato 'bhāvarūpasyāpi viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2490: atha bhāvābhāvābhimatayoḥ sarvathā bhāvābhāvatve na sta ityartho vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2491: tathāpi sata eva bhāvasyaivāsato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2492: yatastasmādviśvasya tena sādhitena bhedavādino 'niṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2497: dvau nañau hi prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2498: evaṃ viyadādikaṃ pakṣīkṛtya bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatve sādhyamāne tasyābhāvatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2501: tathāca viśvasya bhāvābhāvavibhāgasya ca pareṇābhyupagatatvānna bhāvābhāvabhedavādino mamāniṣyaṃ kiñcit /
GSP33nysu__1u:2506: yataḥ sato bhāvasyaiva viśvasya viyadāderasato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2508: yataścāsato 'bhāvasyaiva viśvasya prāgabhāvādeḥ sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2510: yataścāsato 'bhāvasyaiva viśvasya prāgabhāvādeḥ sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2511: ato bhedavādinastena viparītena pratijñātenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2514: vyāvahārikabhāvatvābhāvatvagocaraṃ pramāṇaṃ tattvaviṣayeṇānumānenaiva bādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2518: viśvasya sataḥ satyādvailakṣaṇyamapi mama svayaṃ svamatameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2524: sato vidyamānasyāpyasato bhedaṃ vadato mama yathā viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2525: tathā sato 'pi viśvasya sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ satāṃ bhedavādinaḥ svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2528: tadāpi sato viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sadasadbhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2532: asata eva hi sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ bhedavādino mama svayaṃ sadeva niyamena bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2533: tathāca viśvasya tena sattvānadhikaraṇatvena sādhitenāsattvāpattyā parasyaivāniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2534: aniṣyaprasaṅgena paraṃ nigṛhītavato mamāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // 10 // *2,95*
GSP33nysu__1u:2535: athāsattvānadhikaraṇatve vādiprativādisiddhe sattvānadhikaraṇatvamapyadhikaṃ sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2537: kiñca, na sattvaṃ nāmaikamanugataṃ kintu prativastu sattvāni bhidyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2538: tatra viyadāderasadvailakṣaṇye sati sattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyamānaṃ kimekasattvānadhikaraṇatvamutānekasattvānadhikaraṇatvamatha sarvasattvānadhikaraṇatvam
GSP33nysu__1u:2542: viśvasyāsato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ tāvanmama svayameva sato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ sattvānadhikaraṇatvamapi svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2545: tathāca siddhena tena sādhyamānena mamāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2558: yataḥ sata evāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ tadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2560: yataścāsata eva sato vailakṣaṇyamapi niyatamevātastena sādhyamānena viśvasya sadasattvāpattyā bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2563: dvayorapi sarvathā pratiṣedhātkathaṃ sadasattvaprasaṅga iti cettarhyasata eva sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ sanniyatameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2564: ataḥ sadvailakṣaṇyamuktavā punarasato 'pi vailakṣaṇyena vyāhatena pratijñātena bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2565: evaṃ sata evāsato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ niyatamityasadvailakṣaṇyamuktavā punarviśvasya sadvailakṣaṇyapratijñā vyāhatā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2567: asmādeva hetostatsiddhiriti cettarhi mātā vandhyeti pratijñā kuto vipratiṣiddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2571: kiñca sata eva viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2573: atastena bādhitena sarvathā sattvānadhikaraṇatvena pratijñātena bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2577: kecitte tavāniṣyaṃ kataṃ na bhavediti vyācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2578: tatra na pādādāviti pratiṣedhasya nañā nirdiṣyamanityamiti samādhānamavaseyam / *2,99*
GSP33nysu__1u:2580: sanmātratvaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi tasmāt tadapi no bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.25 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2588: anekasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyamityucyate tarhi satāṃ bhedasaṃsthitistataścāpasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2599: yadi sarvasmātsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sarvasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyatayocyate tarhi sadbhedasaṃsthitiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2617: yadi sattaiva nāsti tadā tadanadhikaraṇatvapratijñā vyārthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2621: santi sattādhikaraṇāni santīti cettarhi kānīti vaktavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:2633: tathāhi sattāsāmānyavidhurasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ sanmātratvaṃ svarūpasattvaṃ tāvadasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2637: arthakriyākāritvaṃ jñānābādhyatvaṃ vā sattvamiti pakṣadvayaṃ sphuṭadoṣatvānna dūṣitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2645: tvayāpi dve tattve sadasidati tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā yadeva sattvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyaiva mayāpyaṅgīkārānna sacchabdārthāniruktiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2652: vijñātasyānyathā samyag vijñānaṃ hyeva tanmatam // MAnuv_1,1.26 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2659: jñānabādhyatvaṃ hi jñānanivartyatvaṃ vā pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ vā hetutvena parasyābhimatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2667: api tarhyajñānopādānakasya samāne viṣaye virodhitā jñānenopādāne nivṛtte svayameva vilapanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2669: “ajñānasya svakāryeṇa vartamānena pravilīnena vā saha jñānena nivṛttibādhaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2673: tathāvidhamapi jñānabādhyatvaṃ pakṣaikadeśe prakṛtyādau na siddhaṃ prativādina iti bhāgāsiddhatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2675: naca vipakṣe kiñcidbādhakamastītyato 'prayojakatvājjñānabādhyatvaṃ na siddhamapi vyāpyatvāsiddhamapīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2678: sato vināśe caitanyasyāpi vināśaprasaṅga iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2684: nanu ca nehanānāstītipratipannopādhau śrautaniṣedhātmā bādhaḥ prapañce 'stīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2689: kiṃ tvadabhimataṃ jñānabādhyatvamatra hetūkriyate kiṃ vāsmadabhimatamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2693: hi yasmādanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānameva bādhastadviṣayatvameva tadbādhyatvaṃ matamasmākam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2695: satyo 'pyātmā dehādyātmanā vijñāto vedāntajanitasamyagvijñānavṛttiviṣaya iti pareṇāpyaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2719: bādhyatvamiti prakṛtaprakṛtyarthaṃ bādhyaṃ taditi sāmānyena parāmṛśati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2725: rajatatvādinā vijñātasya purovartinaḥ śuktitvādinā vijñānaṃ khalvanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2726: evamasato rajatasya sattvādināvagatasyāsattvādinā vijñānamapyanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2727: samyagvijñānaṃ bādha ityevokte sarvamapi samyagjñānaṃ bādhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2730: anyathāvijñātasya jñānamityevokte dhārāvāhikabhrame rājatatvenāvagatasya śuktikāśakalasya punarnāgavaṅgatvādijñāne 'pi prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2734: tena ghaṭasyaiva paṭādyapekṣayānyathā ghaṭatvena jñānasya punarghaṭatvena jñāne prasaṅgo nirastaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2737: evamekenānyathāvijñātasya puruṣāntarasambandhini tasyaiva vā puruṣasya kālāntarabhāvinyājānasiddhe samyagvijñāne prasaṅgo 'pīti cenmaivam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2770: tatra yāvatsu pakṣeṣu siddhāthartvaparyavasānaṃ tāvatsvanirvacanīyatvasya sattvāvirodhitvena na sanprapañcaḥ kintvanirvacanīya ityārambhāsaṅgatirdeṣo 'vagantavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2773: tatra sata eva sattvena pramitasyaiva viyadāderviśvasyāsadvilakṣaṇatvameva svayaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2774: evamasata evāsattvena pramitasyaiva śuktirajatāderviśvasya sarvasyāpyāropitasya sadvilakṣaṇatvameva svayaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2779: ato 'sambhavinā tena lakṣaṇenoktena kathaṃ te 'niṣyaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ na bhavedityādiyojanā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2780: bhedavādina ityanena māyāvādino viyadādau sadvailakṣaṇyāṅgīkāraḥ śuktirajatādau cāsadvilakṣaṇatvābhyupagatirāgrahamātramalaivetyabhipraiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2789: sattvenāsattvena ca vicārāsahatvamanirvacanīyatvaṃ na punaḥ sattvāsattvadharmānadhikaraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2790: brahma tu sattvena vicārasahaṃ kathamanirvacanīyaṃ syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2792: kiñca yo viyadādau vicāraḥ sa brahmaṇyapi samāna iti kathaṃ na tasyānirvacanīyatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2800: tathāpi viyadādau nitye nityatvādeva śuktirajatādau cāsatvānna siddhamityavyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2801: yadi ca pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ tadapi viyadādau na siddhamityavyāptireva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2809: tatprasañjitānyathā'kāraloḍanaṃ samyagvijñānameva bādha ityavadhāraṇatayā matāntarāṇi nirastāni veditavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:2813: iha khalu kecidyathārthameva sarvavijñānamiti manyamānā nānyathākhyātiṃ sahante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2818: kiñca śuktikāyā rajatākārapariṇāmaḥ kiṃ sakāraṇa utākāraṇaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2825: duṣyakaraṇasaṃsargo heturiti cettathāpi kiṃ śuktitvāpagamena rajatarūpapariṇāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2827: ādye puruṣāntareṇāpi tadā śuktitvaṃ na pratyetavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2830: atha punaḥ śuktayākāreṇa rajataṃ pariṇatamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2837: kiñca doṣavaśādrajatākāreṇa pariṇatā cecchuktistadā doṣāpagame 'pi tathaiva kathaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2842: saṃyogapradhvaṃsastu na kadāpi nivartate punaḥ saṃyogalakṣaṇo mukulībhāvastu śītādinodanajanya eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2846: kiñcotpannaṃ cedrajataṃ vinaṣṭaṃ tadā tathaiva pratītiḥ syāt na punarnedaṃ rajatamiti bādhabuddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2849: nahi mṛdo ghaṭākārapariṇāmasya nimittaṃ daṇḍacakrādikaṃ doṣatvena manyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2850: kiñca yasyāḥ pratītestadālambanaṃ tata eva tajjanma kiṃvā pratītyantarāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2874: tathā hi kiṃ vastuno vastvantarātmanā satī utāsatī /
GSP33nysu__1u:2891: na tāvatsadasadbhāvamātreṇālambanaṃ sadbhāvamātrasya sarvavastupratyayasādhāraṇyena sarvapratyayānāṃ sarvārthālambanatvāpatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2905: yena yasyātiśaya utpadyate sa tasya viṣaya iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2906: atiśayo hi jñātatā vā syādvayavahāro vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2917: nahi rūpādijñānamutpādayaccakṣurākāśādinā na sannikṛṣṭata iti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2918: pratyabhijñā ca tattāsannikṛṣṭakaraṇajanyā na tadviṣayā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2924: tatra rajatajñāne śuktiravabhāsate na veti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2925: avabhāsata iti bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2926: yadi saṃvidi bahumānavānneti brūyāttadā kathaṃ tacchuktikālambanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2927: kiñca rajatamavabhāsate śuktikālambanaṃ cedatiprasaṅgaḥ kataṃ pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2928: nanu rajatāvabhāsasya rajataviṣayakatve tena rajatena bhavitavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2940: na khalu jarāmaraṇavidhvaṃsaheturjātu sudhā taddheturapi bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2948: na khalu duṣyaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ vaṭaṃ janayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2952: kiñca pradarśitākāravyabhicāre pratyayasya sarvatra vyabhicāraśaṅkā durvārā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2954: tathāhi jñānameva khalu sarvatra vastuvyavasthāpakaṃ nānyat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2960: naca vācyaṃ yathā ghaṭādeḥ pārthivasya vahnivyabhicāre 'pi na dhūmasyāpi tadvayabhicāraḥ śaṅkayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2963: asti hi tatra pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pyavyabhicāraniścayopāyo dhūmatvādirevāvāntaro viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2973: saṃvādakamapi jñānameveti tadapi kathaṃ saṃśayāspadaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2978: api ca pratīyamāno 'yaṃ rajatākāraḥ kutastya iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2991: tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajatasmṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2993: tathāca rajatasmṛteḥ purovṛttigrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇātsannihitarajatajñānasārūpyeṇedaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:2994: rajatamiti bhinne api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravataryataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3010: naca dahanakāryaṃ kathaṃ doṣaḥ karotīti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3012: jāṭharāgnipariṇatā hi rasāḥ śarīropacayahetavo na bhasmakapariṇatāstathā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3019: padātpadārthasmṛtau hariharādismṛtau ca vyabhicārāt kiñcānubhūtaṃ tāvanna samastaṃ smaryate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3027: nanvevaṃ satyanāsvāditatiktasya śiśostiktasmaraṇānupapatteḥ kathaṃ tikto guḍa iti pratyaya iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3030: athavā nāyaṃ niyamo grahaṇasmaraṇe evāgṛhītaviveke vyavahārādipravartake iti kintu kvacidgrahaṇe eva mitho 'gṛhītabhede /
GSP33nysu__1u:3032: atra hi viniryannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya pītatvaṃ doṣavaśāddravyarahitaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3037: pittaṃ tu ājarvāvasthitaṃ kācamiva svacchaṃ na pratibandhakamiti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3046: tathāca tata eva sarvasyopapattau kiṃ viparyayakalpanayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3049: tadupapattau cāgṛhītavivekasya jñānadvayasya bhrāntitvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3053: nanvatra vigītapratyayo nāma kiṃ purovartinirvikalpakajñānamuta sadṛśadarśanotthaṃ rajarasmaraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3061: tathāstyeva ca tatsamutthaṃ savikalpakamidamiti vedanātsavivādabhedābhedaṃ rajatavedanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3062: tatra vipratipannau bhedābhedau vihāyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātramidaṃ rajatamityādisāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahārakāraṇaṃ pakṣatvena vivakṣitaṃ cetko virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3068: bhede hi vedanayoridaṃ vedanam purovatirmātragocaram na rajatavātā vetti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3069: rajatavedanamapi rajatamātragrāhi nedamiti purovartinamanūdya tasyaiva rajatatāmidaṃ rajatamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3074: tato vipratipannākāraṃ parityajyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātrapakṣīkāre na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3075: kathamanyathākhyātivādīdaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya purovartiviṣayatvasādhanāya sādhanamupanyasyannito doṣādvimucyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3076: atha rajatāthirnaḥ śuktikāyāṃ pravṛttau hetubhūtaṃ jñānaṃ mayā pakṣīkriyata iti cenmoccairvāccaḥ paro 'pi śroṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3077: īśvarajñānena siddhasādhanatā syāditi cettavāpi bādhaḥ kathaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3078: prakṛtapravṛttiheturanīśvarajñānaṃ pakṣīkriyata iti cenmamāpi tathaiva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3079: tvayeśvarānabhyupagamādvayarthaṃ viśeṣaṇamiti cettarhi māṃ prati tavāpi kathaṃ na vyartham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3080: tathāpi vyāptijñāne siddhasādhanateti cettatraiva tava bādhaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3085: kimidaṃ rajatajñānaṃ nāma rajatasya jñānaṃ rajatajñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3087: rajataśabdollekhijñānaṃ vā rajatārthinaḥ pravṛttihetujñānaṃ vā rajatamiti jñānaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3104: dvitīye rajatajñānaśabdena yo 'rthaḥ pareṇa vivakṣyate sa evāsmākaṃ heturbhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3105: tathā hi na tāvadādyaḥ kalpaḥ pareṇāṅgīkartumucitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3113: yatra śuktikātadadhastadrajatamastīti vākyaṃ śrutavataḥ śuktijñānamapi rajatāthirpravṛttiheturbhavatīti tasyāpyanyathākhyātitāpātāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3116: ato rajatajñānaṃ nāmoktapakṣeṣu kiñcidaṅgīkṛtya taddoṣo vā pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3119: kecitpunā rajataviṣayaṃ jñānamityeva hetvarthamupagamya rajatetarāviṣayatvaṃ sādhyamaṅgīkṛtya sādhyāviśiṣṭatādoṣaṃ pariharanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3139: evaṃ sati rajatasyāpi kutaḥ sattvamaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3143: khaṇḍo gauḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityādayaḥ sarva eva savikalpakapratyayā vibhramāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33nysu__1u:3149: kiṃ guṇakriyājātyādeḥ dravyeṇota guṇādīnāmeva parasparamatha guṇāśrayasya kriyāśrayeṇetyādi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3152: na hi śuklaḥ paṭa ityasya śauklayaṃ paṭa ityartho 'bhimato laukikānām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3153: naca calati paṭa ityasya calanaṃ paṭa ityartho 'bhimataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3154: nāpi khaṇḍo gaurityetatkhaṇḍatvaṃ gotvaṃ ca piṇḍa evetyanena samānārtham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3156: daṇḍīti śābdavyavahāre bhedārthapratyayaprayogājjñānamapi tādṛśaṃ kalpyata iti cetsamamatrāpi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3160: ata eva śuklaḥ paṭa ityuktvā śauklayaṃ paṭasyeti vyākartāro bhavanti / *2,196*
GSP33nysu__1u:3162: na hi śuklaḥ paṭaścalatītyasya śauklayaṃ paṭatvaṃ calanaṃ caikamityarthaścetasi cakāsti pratipattṛṇām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3163: tathā sati daṇḍī kuṇḍalī devadatta ityasyāpi jñānasya daṇḍakuṇḍaladevadattatvatādātmyaviṣayatāpātāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3165: samānamekamadhikaraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te hi samānādhikaraṇāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3166: tathāca guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ ca bhedaḥ āśrayāṇāṃ cābhedaḥ sphuṭa eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3173: evañca yatra bhedo na tadabhedena pratibhāsate yaccābhedena pracibhāsate na tatra bheda iti kvātivyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3174: nanu guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ cābhedo bhagavato muneḥ siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3177: tathāca punaḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityādipratyayā vibhramāḥ prasaktāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3182: yadvijñānaṃ yatsannikṛṣṭakaraṇena janyate sa tasya viṣaya ityaṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3189: liṅgasya sādhyadharmisannikarṣo liṅgijñānakāraṇamiti cenna liṅgajñānasya karaṇatayābhyupagamāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3192: tathāpi pratyabhijñāyāṃ tattāṃśena cakṣurāderliṅginā ca liṅgajñānasya vākyārthena vākyajñānasya sannikarṣābhāvādaviṣayatāpattiriti cenna asannikṛṣṭajñāpane 'tiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3197: nahi saṃyogādireva sannikarṣaḥ kiṃ nāma pratyāsattimātram / *2,202*
GSP33nysu__1u:3203: tarhi manaḥsannikṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā jāyamānaṃ rūpajñānaṃ manoviṣayamāpannamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3214: astu vā yadvijñānaṃ yatpratibhāsaṃ tattadviṣayamityeva vyavasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3218: nahi vayamasminpratyaye śuktitvamāvabhāsata iti brūmo yena virodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3221: virodhe vā samīcīnarajata idaṃ rajatamiti pratītirna syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3223: evaṃ sati rajatasyāpi jñānaviṣayatā prasajyata iti cet satyam,
GSP33nysu__1u:3231: vakṣyati ca viṣayasya kuto bādha ityasato rajatatādātmyorjñānaviṣayatāmācāryaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3237: ādye paśuhiṃsā kiṃ dharmajanane svārasikaśaktimatī utādharmajanana iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3238: ādye kataṃ kratubāhyāpi dharmaṃ na janayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3240: sahakārivaśāditi cet aṅgīkṛtaṃ tarhi sahakāriṇāṃ svārasikaśaktipratibandhena viparītaśaktayādhāyakatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3254: guṇā eva na te doṣā iti cet kācādayo 'pi guṇā eva na te doṣā ityuktameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3259: tathā satīśvarajñānasya nityasyārtho viṣayo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3260: pratyabhijñānasya ca tattāṃśo viṣayo na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3266: tatra vyāvartakaṃ kadācidasti rajatādikaṃ kadāpi nāstīti vaiṣamyamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3267: tatkiṃ yadākadācitsataḥ kāraṇatvaṃ pūrvakṣaṇe sato vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3271: atha nātītādirarthaḥ svasāmarthyenānumityādikaṃ vyāvartayati yena tatsattāpekṣā syāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3274: kiñca satyasthale 'pi na sākṣātsākṣātkāraṃ prati kāraṇatvamarthasya kintvindriyasannikarṣasyaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3275: saca yatrāsatā nopapadyate tatrārthasattāmapekṣata iti pāramparyeṇaivārthasya kāraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3276: nanu tarhyasatā rajatādinā sannikarṣāyogātkathamindriyeṇa tajjñānajanmeti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:3279: yāvatkhalu vigīte pratyaye bhāsate tasya sarvasyāsattve 'satkhyātiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3281: yaccoktaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre jñānasya savartrānāśvāsa iti tat autsargikaṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyamapavādādviparyaya iti vadatā'cāryeṇaiva parihariṣyate
GSP33nysu__1u:3282: sākṣī khalu caitanyarūpo niyatayāthārthyaḥ kadācidapi saṃśayānāskandito 'ntaḥkaraṇavṛttīnāṃ yāthārthyaṃ svayameva gṛhṇāti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3284: ata evānāśvāsanirasanopāyo na jñāneṣu kaścidviśeṣo 'stīti nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3285: anyathā parasyāpi kathaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre vyavahṛtervyavahārāntare samāśvāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3287: kvacidvivekāgrahe ca kathamanyatra viśiṣṭapratyaye viśvāso bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3291: bādhakābhāvādinā viśiṣṭajñānasvarūpaniścayamaṅgīkurvāṇaḥ kathaṃ svaprakāśavijñānavādaṃ na jahyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3298: yā caivaṃ prakriyā rajatamidamityādinoktā sā jñānadvitve rajatajñānasya ca smṛtitve pramāṇābhāvādanupapannā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3301: yastu rajatajñānasya smṛtitve pariśeṣopanyāsaḥ so 'pi pratyutpannaka(kā)
GSP33nysu__1u:3304: rajatajñānavata evotpadyamānatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti cenna tathāpi rajatasaṃskāravyavahārādau vyabhicārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3310: kiñcedaṃ smaraṇatvaṃ sādhyaṃ na tāvatsāmānyaṃ guṇeṣu prābhākarairabhyupagatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3327: anyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkita iti cenna tathāpi sandigdhakālātītatānistārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3331: asati bādhake na vṛthānyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkayata iti cet samaṃ prakṛte 'pīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3338: nedaṃ smṛtiriti vyavahartavyaṃ tattollekhādismṛticinhavikalatvāditi prathamaprayoge vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3340: yadapi viparyayābhyupagame kalpanāgauravamuktaṃ tat vivekāgrahamātreṇa pravṛttyāderupapattau tathāstu /
GSP33nysu__1u:3342: kiñcaivamantyatantusaṃyogaparyantaṃ kāraṇakalāpamupādāya paṭo 'pi nāṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tanmātreṇa sarvasyopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3344: naca tena vinaikatvādipratyayopapattiriti cet viparyaye 'pyevamiti kuto gauravam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3347: (ta) yathā hi purovartini rajate rajatamidamiti viśiṣṭaviṣayamekameva vijñānaṃ svaprakāśatayā
GSP33nysu__1u:3348: vā mānasapratyakṣatayā vā sākṣiṇā vāvabhāsate tathedamapīti kuto 'sya na viśiṣṭaviṣayaikajñānatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3349: na hi tato 'sya mātrayāpi viśeṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3351: kevalamekaṃ tādṛgviṣayasadbhāvādyathārthaṃ tadabhāvāparamayathārthamaviśiṣṭaviṣayamanekamapi tadviśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvena pratibhāsata iti cenna
GSP33nysu__1u:3353: nāstyeva viśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvagrāhipratyaya iti cenna anubhavasiddhajñānāpalāpe smṛtyanubhavasvarūpāpalāpaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3357: kiṃ svarūpam uta pṛthaktavam utānyonyābhāvaḥ athavāvaidharmyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3371: rajatāsambhavinaḥ purovartinīdantvasya purovartyasambhavinaśca rajate rajatatvasya gṛhītatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3374: sa cedaṃrajatatvayoḥ svarūpameva pareṣām iti kathaṃ tadavabhāse nāvabhāseta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3378: atha manyase purovatirno yaḥ śuktitvādidharmo rajatavyāvartako yaśca rajate vyavahitadeśatvādidharmaḥ purovartivyāvartakastayoragrahaṇaṃ pravartakamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:3380: purovartino hi śuktitvāgrahe na śuktikārthī tatra pravarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3381: rajatasya cāsannihitatvādidharmāgrahe rajatārthī na tatra pravartatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3391: asti tāvatpravartakatvābhimatapratyaye 'pyapekṣitopāyapurovṛttyavagamāṃśayoḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedavirahādeva bhedāgrahaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3397: kiñca pravartakasādṛśyātpravṛttirityatraiva kalpyate uta yadyatsadṛśaṃ tattatkāryakārīti sarvatra niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3400: pravṛttilobhāditthamāsthīyata iti cenna tasyā viparyayāṅgīkārādeva suvyavasthiteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3403: nanvidaṃ rajatamiti yathā rajatasādhyā buddhī rajatasadṛśācchuktiśakalādbhavati bhavatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3408: api cedaṃ jñānadvayaṃ pravartakasādṛśyamātrādyadi pravṛttimupajanayennivṛttimapi kutā ena janayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3410: nanu ca yathā bhedāgraho bhavatāmabhedagrahaṃ janayati tathā pravṛttimapi kiṃ na janayediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3413: jñānajanane hi kāraṇānāṃ svātantṛyaṃ na puruṣasya /
GSP33nysu__1u:3416: pravṛttau tu puruṣa eva svatantro na jñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3417: sa hi satyapi jñāne 'pekṣita eva pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3422: kiñca jñānamarthe pravṛttiṃ kiṃ sākṣādupajanayati utecchāprayatnadvāreṇa /
GSP33nysu__1u:3432: atha rajate pratipannena rajatatvena tatsamīhitasādhanatājñānamupajātaṃ bhedāgraha(bhedagrahe 'bhedagraha)
GSP33nysu__1u:3442: naca tatra saṃsargagrahaḥ pravartakaḥ samavāyo hi tayoḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3447: avisaṃvādivyavahārajanakatvaviśiṣṭasākāṃkṣarūparūpisahopalambho hi talliṅgam na cāvisaṃvāditvaṃ prāk pravṛtteḥ śakyādhigamam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3448: asti cedaṃ sakalamapi pravartakaṃ vibhrame 'pīti kuto viparyayābhāve pravṛttyanupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3452: rajatatvena sahāgṛhītāsaṃsargatayā vā rajatādagṛhītabhedatayā vā samīhitasādhanatānumānopapatteriti etadapyayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3457: nirvikalpake tu vastusvarūpamātramiti bheda iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3464: ata tadvastudarśanasāpekṣadaśarnaṃ nirvikalpake 'cakāsadapi savikalpake bhātīti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3474: tatra kiṃ tadanvayajñānaṃ pravṛttau niyatamutāniyatamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3476: anyathākhyātiṃ vinā na rajatārthinaḥ purovartini pravṛttiriti tāvatsiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3479: pratibhāsamānayorasaṃsargāgrahe sati saṃsargagraho 'varjanīyasannidhiriti cenna viparyayasyāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3485: purovarti vā rajatajñānagocaro rajatajñānagocaro rajatānupāyatve sati tadarthipravṛttiviṣayatvātsamyagrajatavat /
GSP33nysu__1u:3486: vivādapadaṃ rajatajñānamidaṃ jñānānna bhidyate prakāśamānāttato 'prakāśamānabhedatve sati prakāśamānatvātsampratipannarajatajñānavadityādayaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3487: kiñca viparyayābhāve nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya bādhakatvamanupapadyamānaṃ taṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3507: tatra kimidaṃ jñānatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ vā pratiniyataṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3519: meruḥ sarṣapa ityādivāyānmerorapi sarṣapatvena pratibhāsāddṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavaikalyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3520: anyathā tathāvidhavākyābhāsaṃ śrutavatā tatpratiṣedho na kriyetāprasaktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3522: api caivaṃ satyagniranuguṇa iti bādhitaviṣayasya vākyasya ghaṭaḥ pacatītyapārthakādbhedo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3540: anyathā śvetaketūddālakākhyāyikayā pratipāditatvādadvaitamapi na śrutyabhiprāyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3542: ityapi paropāsanānuvādo na svārthe tātparyavān syāt“atha yo 'nyāṃ devatāmupāste';
GSP33nysu__1u:3547: yata evaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ svalakṣaṇamatra sūtre brahmaṇo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:3550: ato jīvaikyamapi sa nirācakre jagadguruḥ // MAnuv_1,1.99ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3559: syādayamadvaitināmanupapanno lakṣaṇārambho yadīdaṃ jīvavyāvṛttyarthaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3560: jaḍamātravyāvṛttyarthaṃ tu lakṣaṇe vyākhyāyamāne kathaṃ jīvaikyavādināṃ lakṣaṇasūtrārambho 'nupapanna ityata āha- nahīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3561: nahi janmādihetutvaṃ jīvasya jagato bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.99cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3563: yatra hi lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti tatsarvaṃ tadvayāvartyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3567: kiñcānena lakṣaṇena yadi jīvo na vyāvartyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:3569: tathā sati lakṣaṇasya jīve 'tivyāptimāśaṅkayetaravyapadeśāddhitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiriti sūtrakārīyaṃ tannirākaraṇamasaṅgataṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3571: kathañcicchaṅkāyāṃ vā tasyāpi lakṣyatvāṅgīkāraṃ parityajya tatra na lakṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ kriyata ityāśavānāha- hitākriyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3572: hitākriyādidoṣaṃ ca vakṣyatyeva svayaṃ prabhuḥ // MAnuv_1,1.100ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3576: paricchinnajñānakriyāśakteḥ saṃsāriṇo hiraṇyagarbhādutpattyādi na sambhāvayitumapi śakyate'; iti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3579: ito 'pi māyāvādināṃ na brahmalakṣaṇasūtrārambhaḥ sambhavatītyāha- nirguṇatvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3580: nirguṇatvaṃ ca tenaiva niṣiddhaṃ prabhuṇā svayam // MAnuv_1,1.100cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3583: tato 'nenāpi lakṣaṇāvākyena brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena tadavinābhūtaiḥ sarvajñatvādibhiśca saṃsargaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3585: nirviśeṣatvavādināṃ ca nirviśeṣatvaṃ niṣedhataḥ sūtrasyārambhaḥ kathamupapadyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3590: nahi tathāvidhaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ vā brahmaṇo nirguṇatvaṃ vā viruṇaddhi / *3,46*
GSP33nysu__1u:3594: su samyak svarūpāntargatyā na lakṣaṇānīti vā tadarthopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3595: tarhi yato 'sya janmādi sā māyā tadāśrayo brahmeti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3599: nanu taṭasthenāpi jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena brahmaṇo jīvaikyaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ ca (ni)
GSP33nysu__1u:3604: tatra kākādhikaraṇatvaṃ tadanadhikaraṇebhyo gṛhaṃ vyāvartayati na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3606: ādye brahmalakṣaṇamapi kathaṃ na jīvavyāvṛttiṃ karoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3607: kathaṃ ca tatsambandhena saguṇaṃ na bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3609: yo hi kāryakāraṇasaṅghātādaviviktaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvadoṣasaṃsargiṇamātmānaṃ matvā kliśyati sa jīvo vyāvartyata eva te(ane)
GSP33nysu__1u:3611: tatra yaścaitanyadhātuḥ sa brahmaṇo na bhidyata ityabhyupagame virodhābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3612: naca satyasya prapañcasya kāraṇabhūtāyāḥ satyāyā māyāyā āśrayo brahmeti sūtrārtho yena brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3613: kintu yadavaṣṭambho viśvo vivartaḥ prapañcastad brahmeti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3614: sati caivaṃ sūtrārthe kathaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ brahmaṇo nirguṇatvaṃ ca viruddhayata iti / *3,47*
GSP33nysu__1u:3619: taṭasthena jagajjanmādikāraṇatvenātra sūtre lakṣaṇayā brahma pratipādyata iti kuto 'ṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3621: na tāvad brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya bādhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadagocaratvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3628: janmādyasya yatastad brahmeti lakṣaṇayocyata iti kalpyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3630: bhedenaiva tu mukhyārthasambhave lakṣaṇā kutaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.101ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3632: yadi jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaparirakṣaṇāya yathāśrutaṃ sūtrārthaṃ parityajya lakṣaṇāśrīyate tarhi jīvabrahmaṇorbhedenaivāṅgīkṛtena sūtrasya mukhyārthasambhave lakṣaṇā kasmādāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3633: nanvabhedamupādāya sūtre lakṣaṇā vā'śrayaṇīyā bhedamupādāya makhyavṛttirveti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3634: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ dvitīyaḥ pakṣa eva śreyāniti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3645: ityādinā prakṛtaḥ prekṣāpūrvaṃ tejo 'bannādīnāṃ sraṣṭā sarvāsāṃ prajānāṃ mūlamāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhā ca sakalāvadyagandhavidhuro 'paricchinnaguṇākaraḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3657: nanu kiṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ mukhyamupādāya tattvaṃpadayorlākṣaṇikatvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3658: kiṃvā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ gauṇaṃ gṛhītvā tattvaṃpadayormukhyārthatā vyākhyātavyeti sandehe na vinigamanāyāṃ heturasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3664: iti vākyaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ pratipādayatītyatra virodhyākāraparityāgo nāma na tāvadavivakṣāmātramityuktaṃ prāk /
GSP33nysu__1u:3673: nanu ca virodhyākāraparityāgena jīvasya brahmaikyamityasyārtho na virodhyākārāvivakṣāmātreṇeti nāpyanityatveneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3681: sadaiva guṇavattve 'sya bhinnaṃ syānnirguṇaṃ sadā // MAnuv_1,1.102ab // *3,57*
GSP33nysu__1u:3683: yadi nirguṇaṃ saguṇādatyantabhinnaṃ tarhyasya saguṇasya nityaṃ saguṇatvāttasmānnityameva nirguṇaṃ bhinnaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3687: āropapravāhasya cānādinityatayā sadā saguṇatvaṃ ca nāniṣyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3690: yathā vā yadidaṃ rajataṃ sā śuktirityevaṃ pareṇa svābhisandhāvudghāṭite satyāha- naceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3698: ato guṇarāhityalakṣaṇaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ na sarvathā śakyanirūpaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3715: evaṃ dharmarāhityalakṣaṇaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ nirākṛtamapyāgrahamātreṇa yo 'ṅgīkaroti taṃ prati solluṇṭhamāha- nirguṇatvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3716: nirguṇatvaṃ tadā ca syādāsuratvaṃ nacānyathā // MAnuv_1,1.103ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3719: ṇatve nirākṛte 'pi yadi nirguṇatvaṃ parasmai ruciṃ syāt tarhi guṇaśabdoditasakalaśubharāhityalakṣaṇamāsuratvameva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3723: nahi nānāvidhakāryakriyāveśātmatvaṃ tatprasavaśaktayatmakaṃ vā jijñāsyaviśuddhabrahmāntargataṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3730: yadapi guṇaguṇinoranyatvānanyatvābhyāmanirūpaṇāditi lakṣaṇasya taṭasthatvādi siddhaye pareṇoktaṃ taddūṣayitumanuvadati- lakṣyalakṣaṇayoriti
GSP33nysu__1u:3736: tadubhayamapi lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyādbrahmaṇo bhinnamabhinnaṃ bhinnābhinnaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3749: naca tadeva tadaiva prasiddhamaprasiddhaṃ ceti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3766: tatra jagajjanmādikāraṇatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣasya sadbhāvāttadbalena
GSP33nysu__1u:3767: sarvamutpadyata iti vaktuṃ nirbhedavastuni pareṇa viśeṣasyānaṅgīkṛtatvāt ghaṭādīnāṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:3768: ca mithyātvenāṅgīkṛtānāmanudāharaṇatvātsatya eva vastunyasāvudapapādanīya iti manvāna āha- tadeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3771: yadyevaṃ pṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayasi tadaikyasya gatirnirūpaṇaprakāro na vidyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3782: tattvamasītyādivākyapratipādyamaikyaṃ kiṃ tatpadalakṣitāccaitanyādabhinnamuta bhinnamatha bhinnābhinnamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3783: pareṇāṅgīkṛtatvena prādhānyādabhedapakṣaṃ tāvadādau nirākaroti- aikyābheda iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3784: aikyābhede na śāstreṇa jñeyaṃ tat svaprakāśataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.104cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3786: aikyasya caitanyasvarūpābhede 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe tadaikyaṃ tattvamasītyādinā śāstreṇa pratipādyaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3794: atha śāstraṃ naikyaṃ pratipādayati kintu bhedabhramaṃ nirākaroti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3817: nanu kathaṃ tarhi so 'yaṃ devadatta iti vākyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3819: bhede mithyātvato bhedasatyatvaṃ syād balādapi // MAnuv_1,1.105ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3832: nanu na kutrāpi satayo bhedo 'smābhirabhyupeyate tatkathaṃ vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3835: yayordūrasthayorvanaspatyoraikyaṃ mithyā tayorbhedaḥ satya iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3836: athavā yasya svarūpeṇa sato yo 'bhāvo mithyā tasya tadviparītaḥ satyo yathā brahmaṇo
GSP33nysu__1u:3843: tadā vaktavyaṃ tau kiṃ caitanyādabhinnāvuta bhinnau atha bhinnābhinnāviti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3850: sa bhedaḥ kiṃ bhedibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno bhinnābhinno vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3855: nanu bhedasya bhedāntaraṃ bhedābhedayośca bhedābhedāntaramityetāvatā nānavasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3859: yadyapi bhedābhedāṅgīkāre virodho vaktuṃ śakyate tathāpi sphuṭatvānnoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3868: tadā pṛcchāmaḥ svasya nirvāhakaṃ hi svanirvāhakaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ svanirvāhakatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3871: tathā caikasyaivaikasyāmeva nirvāhakriyāyāṃ karmakartṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3872: tannirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvaṃ ca parasparaṃ dharmiṇā kriyayā cātyantābhinnamu(tātyaṃ)
GSP33nysu__1u:3875: paryāyo bhedavān vā syādanavasthobhayatra ca // MAnuv_1,1.106b-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:3877: nirvāhyamiti nirvāhakamiti apiśabdānnirvāhakamityapi śabdasamūhaḥ paryāyaḥ prasajyeta ekārthatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3881: yadi nirvāhyatvādirarthaḥ parasparaṃ dharmiṇā na bhedavān syāttadā tadbhedadvayasya bhedisvarūpamātratve paryāyatvādidoṣaprasaṅgādbhedāntaravadityaṅgīkaraṇīyam
GSP33nysu__1u:3882: tathāca parasparaṃ bhedaṃ dharmibhedaṃ vā'śrityobhayatrānavasthā syāditi / *3,74*
GSP33nysu__1u:3888: satyajñānādikaṃ parasparaṃ brahmaṇā cātyantābhinnaṃ vā bhinnaṃ vā bhinnābhinnaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3899: nanu satyajñānādīnāṃ parasparaṃ brahmaṇā cātyantamabheda eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3902: parāparasāmānyavācināṃ saguṇabrahmavācināṃ vā teṣāṃ parabrahmaṇi lakṣaṇayā pravṛttyaṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3903: naca vācyaṃ satyapadena lakṣitasyaiva jñānapadena lakṣaṇāyāṃ vaiyarthyāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3915: brahmaviśeṣaṇatvenāsatyatvādivyāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ prayojanaṃ satyādipadānāṃ tvayā vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3920: vyāvṛttervyāvṛttasya brahmaṇo 'viśeṣatve sā svatantrā vyāvṛttirna prayojanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3922: mumukṣuṇā brahma vā taddharmo vā jijñāsitavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3932: viśeṣaṇābhidhānamukhena vyāvṛttiḥ padānāṃ prayojanamiti vaktuṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ / *3,80*
GSP33nysu__1u:3935: asatyatvādivyāvṛttiḥ padānāṃ prayojanamiti vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3936: nahi tīre nadītvamanabhidadhato nadīpadasyānadītvavyāvṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3940: nirviśeṣe svayaṃprakāśamāne virodhyākārāropa evānupapanna iti coktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3944: tattasmādakhaṇḍaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ vākyadvayapratipādyamityetanmataṃ khaṇḍitaṃ dūṣitaṃ veditavyamityarthaḥ / *3,81*
GSP33nysu__1u:3953: viśeṣābhāvo hi nirviśeṣaṃ brahmeti vākyena pratipādayitumiṣyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3955: ayamapi viśeṣo nirviśeṣamityanena nirākriyata iti kutastatrāpi svakriyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3957: tarhyetadvacanakartṛtvamapi mūko 'hamityanena nirākriyata iti kutastatrāpi svakriyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3976: ata uktaprakāreṇa mahāvākyāvāntaravākyayoranyathānupapattibalādbhedarahite 'pi brahmaṇyayamanupapattiśāntiheturviśeṣo nāma śaktiviśeṣo 'ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3982: yato bhedahīne 'pi vastunyasti kaścicchaktiviśeṣo yena prakāśamānamapi na prakāśata ityādi yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3983: sa ca viśeṣo 'nayaivārthāpattyāvagamyata ityeva tvayā vaktavyamiti / *3,85*
GSP33nysu__1u:3985: so 'pi hi viśeṣo yadi vastuno bhinnastarhi bhedānavasthādi doṣaḥ syādabhinnatve ca viśeṣatadvadbhāvānupapattestādavasthyādityata āha- viśeṣeti
GSP33nysu__1u:3991: sa eva viśeṣo viśeṣāntaramantareṇa viśeṣatadvadbhāvaṃ ca ghaṭayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3992: ekasyaiva nirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvaṃ ca tadbalādeva siddhayatītyaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti / *3,86*
GSP33nysu__1u:3993: nanvabhinne vastuni bhedakāryanirvāhakatvaṃ viśeṣasya kutaḥ pramāṇāt(taḥ)
GSP33nysu__1u:4005: etadubhayānyathānupapattyā bhedarahite 'pi caitanye bhedrapratinidhistatkāyarkārī kaścidatiśayo 'stīti kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4008: asau siddha iti kiṃ tatra pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇeneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4017: tathā hi paṭastacchauklayaṃ ca tāvanna bhidyete /
GSP33nysu__1u:4023: nāpi kuṇḍamiva paṭo 'dhikaraṇatvena badarāṇīva śauklayamādheyatvena parisphurati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4048: 'pi paṭe 'sti kaścidatiśayo bhedapratinidhiryadvaśādidaṃ sarvaṃ samañjasaṃ syādityeva kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4051: nanu bhedābhedāṅgīkāreṇānupapatteḥ śamanāt kiṃ viśeṣeṇeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4060: prāptaṃ tarhi sakalavastūnāmaikyamityata āha- viśeṣā iti // *3,92*
GSP33nysu__1u:4064: te prakṛtasvarūpā viśeṣā aśeṣato vastuṣvananteṣu dravyeṣvanantā eva santi /
GSP33nysu__1u:4067: nanvekaikasmiṃśca dravye viśeṣo 'pyekaiko 'sti tadā paṭo mahāṃśchuklaścalatīti vicitrānekavyavahārānupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4070: tataśca viśeṣāṅgīkāro vyarthaḥ syādityata āha- viśeṣā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4071: te 'pyuktalakṣaṇā viśeṣā aśeṣato 'pi vastuṣu pratyekamanantāḥ santyato noktadoṣāvakāśaḥ anantā ityupalakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4072: yatra yāvanto vyavahārāstatra tāvanto viśeṣā iti jñātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4075: tathāca bhinnanāṃ dravyābhede dravyasyāpi bhedaprasaṅga ityata āha- parampareti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4081: sarvaṃ caitadviśeṣasvarūpasādhakārthāpattyaiva siddhamiti na pṛthak pramāṇamuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4087: tathāpi vipratipanno na tanmātreṇa bodhayituṃ śakyata ityarthāpattirupanyasteti / *3,94*
GSP33nysu__1u:4092: yatpareṇa pṛṣṭaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇayorbheda ityādi tasyedamuttaram- brahma nirbhedamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4100: brahma ca guṇāścetyapunaruktabhaṇanaṃ ca yujyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4102: tvameva brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamabhipretya tatsādhanāya jagajjanmādikāraṇatvalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayituṃ pravṛttamiti sūcayitum /
GSP33nysu__1u:4103: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya svalakṣaṇatve bādhakābhāvānna taṭasthatvakalpanaṃ yuktamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:4108: yadi ca sūtrakāreṇa samavāyo nirākariṣyata iti nāṅgīkārārhastadā guṇaguṇinoreva sa kaścittādṛśaḥ svabhāvabheda ityaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4109: nahi paṭādau bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣabalādvayavahāraviśeṣadarśanamātreṇa brahmaṇyapi tathā kalpayituṃ yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4125: mūlaśrutyaṅgīkāre saiva viśeṣābhidhātrī bhaviṣyatīti pramitametannirbhedameva brahma viśeṣabalādeva nānāvyavahārālambanamiti / *3,96*
GSP33nysu__1u:4126: atra yatpareṇa jagatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ brahmaṇo nimittatvamevotopādānatvamevāthobhayamapīti vimṛśya tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ (pari)gṛhītaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4130: tasmāduktalakṣaṇadvayopapannaṃ brahma nārāyaṇākhyaṃ mumukṣuṇā jijñāsyamiti sthitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4137: tasya harahiraṇyagarbhādicetaneṣu pradhānādyacetaneṣu ca pāśupatādyāgamānumānāvaṣṭambhenātivyāptimāśaṅkyātra pariharati bhagavāntsūtrakāraḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:4160: aparastu saṅkalpavargādyapratyakṣaphalāni vidadhānaḥ śivasya jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasarvajñatvasavarśaktitvasatyasaṅkalpatvādyaśeṣaguṇapūrṇatvaṃ niravadyatvaṃ ca pratipādayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4167: tataśca tatpraṇetuḥ śivasya paramāptatvamavadhārya taddṛṣṭāntena tatpraṇītasya dvitīyasyāpyāgamasya prāmāṇyamavasīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4173: anayaiva diśā tattadāgamaprāmāṇyaṃ tattaddevatāvādināṃ pratyavasthānāni draṣṭavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:4185: ityādibhiranumānairviśvodayasthitilayakartari sāmānyataḥ siddhe asmadādīnāṃ tadasambhavāt bhagavāṃśchiva eva pariśeṣājjagajjanmādikartā siddhayati
GSP33nysu__1u:4186: yathā ca (vi)citrādikāryadaśarnāttadanuguṇa eva kartā kalpyate evaṃ vicitrānekakāryadaśarnāt(nena)
GSP33nysu__1u:4188: athavā kṣityādikaṃ kartetyadantargatameva savarjñatvādikaṃ na yatnāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4196: ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvāścetyādinoktaṃ śāstraṃ yoniḥ kāraṇamabhivyañjakaṃ pramāṇamasyeti śāstrayoni tasya bhāvaḥ śāstrayonitvaṃ tasmāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4198: jagajjanmādikāraṇasya vastuno vedādiśāstraikasamadhigamyatvena śaivādyāgamānumānāgocaratvānna tairanyeṣāṃ jagatkāraṇatvaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4199: kintu śāstraṃ yasya jagatkāraṇatvamācaṣṭe sa eva tathābhyupagantavya iti / *3,103*
GSP33nysu__1u:4201: yadi śāstraikasamadhigamyatvaṃ sautro hetuḥ siddhaḥ syānna caivam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4203: ityāśaṅkaya sautrahetusiddhaye śaivādyāgamagamyatvaṃ tāvannirācikīrṣustatprāmāṇyasādhakaṃ paropanyastamanumānamapākaroti- iti cediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4207: tadgaḥ pratyakṣāvagataścāsau vyabhicāraḥ phalavyabhicāraśca so 'syastīti tadgavyabhicārivākyaṃ tena dṛṣṭāntabhūtena śivādīnāṃ jagatkāraṇatvā(vagamahetubhūtā)
GSP33nysu__1u:4210: yadi pratyakṣasaṃvādena dṛṣṭārthānāṃ śivādivākyānāṃ prāmāṇyamanumāya taddṛṣṭāntenādṛṣṭārthānāmapi śivādivākyatvena hetunā prāmāṇyamanumīyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:4211: tarhi dṛṣṭārtheṣveva vākyeṣu yatpratyakṣata eva phalavyabhicāravaddṛśyate tasya,
GSP33nysu__1u:4215: na hi dṛṣṭārthaṃ sarvameva śivavākyaṃ samarthapravṛttijanakam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4218: phalavyabhicārastu kartṛkarmādivaiguṇyanimitta iti cettarhi tadapi vākyamapramāṇameva phalasaṃvāsadastu kākatālīyo vā jagadvayāmohakānāṃ śivādīnāṃ guḍajihvikā vetyastu /
GSP33nysu__1u:4219: prāmāṇye hi sudṛḍhanirūḍhe vyabhicārasya kartrādivaiguṇyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4223: kiñca yaḥ śivāgamasyādṛṣṭārthasyāpyevaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ manyate sa hiraṇyagarbhādyāgamānāmapi prāmāṇyamaṅgīkaroti na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4228: atha tadanumānamaprayojakaṃ hiraṇyagarbhavākyatve 'pyāgantukena vipralambhādīnāṃ doṣeṇaikasyāprāmāṇyasambhavāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:4245: īśvare jagatkāraṇe pṛthak svatantrānumā ca na mānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4247: yattāvatsāmānyato jagatkartṛtvasiddhāvanumānam tatra kiṃ kāraṇādisākṣātkāravatkartṛpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4254: kathañcidasya hetuviśeṣaṇatve sādhanavaikalyaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntasya syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4273: tarhyutpattyanantarameva kiṃ na kuryāditi cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4288: anyathā kathaṃ bhūtale ghaṭabhāvābhāvau yugapatsambhavata itrata cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4291: pakṣiṇo bhāvābhāvau yugapaditi tatrāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4294: khananādinā yeṣāṃ vibhāgo nodanādinā ca yeṣāṃ saṃyogaste kṣityādīnāmavayavāḥ pratyakṣasiddhā iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:4295: tatkiṃ saṃyogavibhāgisajatīyadravyāntaravattvaṃ sāvayavatvamityuktaṃ bhavati uta tadārabdhatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4313: anayaiva diśā sarvāṇi jagatkāraṇamātrasādhanāni svatantratānumānāni nirasanīyāni(iti) / *3,114*
GSP33nysu__1u:4314: yacca śivādīnāṃ jagatkāraṇatve pariśeṣānumānaṃ tadapi kiṃ śāstrānusāri kiṃvā kevalam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4318: īśvare śive jagatkartari ca pṛthaganumānaṃ na mānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4325: evakāro na dūṣaṇāntarānveṣaṇena vṛthā manaḥ khedanīyaṃ sphuṭadoṣe satīti dyotayati / *3,116*
GSP33nysu__1u:4326: īśvaravākyatvaṃ kathamatra hetuḥ syādityata āha- puṃstveti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4333: atha pariśeṣato jagatkartṛtvaṃ tasminnanumimānasya tavāpi kutaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4338: nanu jakatkāraṇatvaṃ śivaniṣṭhamanyatrānupapattau satyāṃ kiñcinniṣṭhatayā pramitatvāditi hi pariśeṣānumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4357: tarko jñāpayituṃ śakto neśitāraṃ kathañcana // MAnuv_1,1.115 //
GSP33nysu__1u:4368: yadapi kāryatvādihetoḥ pakṣadharmatābalādanyasmādvānumānadīśvarasya sārvajñādisiddhiriti tadapi pratipakṣaduṣṭatvādayuktamityāha- vanakṛttvādīti
GSP33nysu__1u:4370: kiñcijjñānaṃ hi puṃstvena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ sukham // MAnuv_1,1.116 // *3,122*
GSP33nysu__1u:4378: tatkathamucyate īśituḥ kiñcijjñatvaṃ ca puṃstvena sādhayituṃ śakyaṃ hīti tatrāha- sukhamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4380: prasiddhakartṛrahitaṃ vanaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityādinā yo vanādikartā siddhaḥ tenaivākāreṇa taṃ pakṣīkṛtya prayoge na ko 'pi doṣa ityāśayaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:4384: sa evakṣityādikarteti kathaṃ na sārvajñyamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4386: nahi kāryatvādihetuḥ kartāramiva tasya sarvatraikatvaṃ gamayituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4389: loke hi gajagavayagardabhādīnāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ ca nirmātāro vijātīyā evopalabhyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:4390: naca vanakartā kiñcijjña iti sādhane kimīśvarasyeti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4395: vṛkṣakṛnnākhilaṃ vṛkṣaṃ vetti puṃstvāddhi caitravat // MAnuv_1,1.117ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:4403: nahi yo yatkartā sa sakalaṃ tajjānātīti niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4406: anenaiva nyāyena sarvatra pratipakṣasambhavāt satyasaṅkalpatvāśarīritvanityajñānecchāprayatnatvaduḥkhādirāhityādikamapi nānumānena sādhayituṃ śakyamityāśayavānāha- ityādīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4418: vastutvāt turagaḥ śṛṅgī puṣpavat khaṃ sutairyutā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4419: citriṇī ca rasaḥ ṣaṣṭho rasatvāt sottaro bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.118a-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:4422: ṣaṣṭho raso rasāntaravānityukte prathamādirasena siddhasādhanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4432: na ca(nu) viṣāṇaṃ nāma mahattve satyudbhūtarūpa(ḥ)
GSP33nysu__1u:4446: anumānatvaṃ yadi kāryatvādau varteta tadā tadaviśiṣṭe vastutvādau(api)
GSP33nysu__1u:4448: nanu vicāraśāstramārabhya jagatkāraṇe 'numānānavakāśavyutpādanaṃ vyāhatamityāśaṅkāṃ pariharannupasaṃharati- upakramādīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4463: pūvarsūtre jagatkāraṇatvena pratītaṃ sārvajñaṃ brahmaṇo vedakāraṇatvena sphuṭīkriyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4465: kathaṃ cānantapadārthātmakasya prapañcasya kartṛtvena na sphuṭaṃ tadekadeśavedakāraṇatvena sphuṭībhaviṣyati sārvajñam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4466: atha jagatkāraṇatvaṃ pradhānādivyudāsena brahmaṇyeva sādhayituṃ hetutvenoktaṃ sārvajñaṃ śāstrayonitvena sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4470: tarhi jagatkāraṇatvameva tena kiṃ na sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4472: jagatkāraṇatvena savarjñatvaṃ na siddhayati vedākartṛtvādityāśaṅkayedamuktamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4475: viyadadhikaraṇādau sāpi nirākariṣyata iti cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4481: yo yāvadarthapratipādakasya vākyasya praṇetā sa tato 'pyadhikamarthaṃ jānātyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:4483: ayaṃ cāśeṣārthapratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇetātaḥ kathaṃ na sarvatra iti cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4498: kiñca vede jñānakaraṇatvaśaktirbrahmaṇi ca tatkartṛtvaśaktiriti kiṃ kena saṅgatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4508: tathāpi śāstrata evānyeṣāṃ harahiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ pradhānādīnāṃ ca jagatkāraṇatvapratīterativyāpakamidaṃ lakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4511: yadyapi nāmāni sarvāṇītyādiśrutyā śivādināmnāṃ viṣṇau śaktimātramavasīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4513: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti hi nyāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4524: upakramādaya evānvīyante śaktitātparyagocareṇa sambaddhayante tathā jñāyanta iti yāvat vākyānyetaiḥ ityanvayanāmānaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4531: yatrāpi pratīvyākhyāne na vyabhicaratastatrāpyupakramādyanusandhānapūrvakatvenaiva na tu svataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4536: mukhyārtho bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvaśāstrasya nāparaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.119b-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:4541: tasya ca pravicārita ityadhyāhṛtakriyayā sambandho darśitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4542: nanu ca pratītivyākhyānavadupakramādīnāmapi kvacittātparyavyabhicāradarśanātkathaṃ liṅgatvamityāśaṅkānirāsāya samyak pravicārita ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4543: upakramādīnāṃ śrutyādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣaviprakarṣābhyāṃ sāvakāśatvādinā ca balābalaviniścayapuraḥsaraṃ virodhe balavatā durbalabādhayā vākyārthavimarśaḥ samyak pravicāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4559: anvayādupakramādiliṅgasamudāyāt śāstre samyak pravicārite sati sarvaśāstrasya bhagavatyeva
GSP33nysu__1u:4561: jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena śāstrayoni na tu harahiraṇyagarbhādaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4563: tatra ca śāstraṃ pramāṇīkriyamāṇaṃ vacanavṛttyā sarvameva ca yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4570: nanu janmādyasya yata iti yacchabdaśravaṇāttadbrahmeti prakṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4575: naca tasya tadityanuktau anvayaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4584: saṃśabdena sakalapadānāṃ lakṣaṇayā brahmaprātipadikārthamātraparatvamucyata iti vyākhyānamakhaṇḍārthanirāsena nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4586: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena mukhyayā vṛttyā varṇapadavākyātmakāśeṣaśāstrapratipādyaṃ nārāyaṇākhyaṃ brahmaiveti susthaṃ lakṣaṇamiti siddham
GSP33nysu__1u:4607: apara āha na sarvaśāstrapratipādyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati niścayopāyābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4615: naca vastuni vikalpaḥ sambhavati iti atrāpi sandehaḥ samāskandati,
GSP33nysu__1u:4616: ityato na sarvaśāstraprāmāṇyājjagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ samastaguṇaparipūrṇaṃ brahma siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4617: ityevaṃ prāpte avācyatvaśaṅkāṃ tāvannirācaṣṭe sūtrakāraḥ- īkṣaternāśabdamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4621: na cāvivakṣitārthaṃ śabdamātraṃ brahmaṇo vācyatve heturbhavitumarhatīti tadartho 'nenopalakṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4623: sambandhaśca na kartṛtvādirūpaḥ śrutyananugamāt vipakṣe bādhakābhā(vācca)
GSP33nysu__1u:4627: tasmādīkṣaṇakarmatvameva hetutayā vivakṣitam ityāśayenoktam- īkṣaṇīyatvata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4632: na vidyate vācakaḥ śabdo yasya tadaśabdam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4634: vācyamiti vaktavye nāvācyamiti vacanaṃ“dvau nañau prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayataḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:4646: vācyamiti tu pratijñāte parapakṣapratiṣedho na kṛtaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4653: īkṣaṇīyatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ“sa etasmājjīvadhanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamīkṣate'“ātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet';
GSP33nysu__1u:4668: tathāca prakārāntarābhāve sati yadi brahma vācyamapi na bhavettadekṣaṇīyamapi na bhavediti bādhakaṃ sambhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:4671: yat yatkārakāviṣayaḥ tat tatkriyāviṣayaḥ yathā kuṭhārādyaviṣayo gaganaṃ na chidāviṣaya iti sāmānyavyāptisambhavācca / *3,165*
GSP33nysu__1u:4680: hi yasmādanyathā vācyatvābhāve lakṣyatvaṃ kvāpi na dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4683: kenacicchabdena vācyameva hi tīrādikaṃ kenacillakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti / *3,167*
GSP33nysu__1u:4694: lākṣaṇiko hi śabdo na śrutamātro 'rthāntare dhiyamupajanayati tatrāgṛhītaśaktitvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4699: kiṃ nāmārthāntarasya svarūpato vācyārthasambandhitayā cāvagatau satyām /
GSP33nysu__1u:4700: gaṅgādiśabdena hi svarūpato gaṅgādisambandhitayā cāvagatameva tīrādikaṃ lakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4705: tato lākṣaṇikaśabde prayukte vācyārthe 'nupapattiṃ paśyato lakṣaṇīye 'rthe kiṃ tadyadanena lakṣyamiti jijñāsāyāṃ śabda eva prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4706: tenāpi cenna vācyaṃ kintu lakṣyameva tarhi punaḥ kiṃ taditi jijñāsāyā anivṛttatvācchabdāntarameva vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4709: yadi ca kenacicchabdena vācyaṃ syāttadā taduktāvuparatajijñāso lākṣaṇikakāryaṃ pratīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4712: tasmādvipakṣe 'navasthālakṣaṇabādhakasadbhāvādavācyatve lakṣyatvaṃ na syāditi yukto 'tiprasaṅga iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4713: lākṣaṇiko hi śabdo na śrutamātro 'rthāntare dhiyamupajanayati tatrāgṛhītaśaktitvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4718: kiṃ nāmārthāntarasya svarūpato vācyārthasambandhitayā cāvagatau satyām /
GSP33nysu__1u:4719: gaṅgādiśabdena hi svarūpato gaṅgādisambandhitayā cāvagatameva tīrādikaṃ lakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4724: tato lākṣaṇikaśabde prayukte vācyārthe 'nupapattiṃ paśyato lakṣaṇīye 'rthe kiṃ tadyadanena lakṣyamiti jijñāsāyāṃ śabda eva prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4725: tenāpi cenna vācyaṃ kintu lakṣyameva tarhi punaḥ kiṃ taditi jijñāsāyā anivṛttatvācchabdāntarameva vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4728: yadi ca kenacicchabdena vācyaṃ syāttadā taduktāvuparatajijñāso lākṣaṇikakāryaṃ pratīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4731: tasmādvipakṣe 'navasthālakṣaṇabādhakasadbhāvādavācyatve lakṣyatvaṃ na syāditi yukto 'tiprasaṅga iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4739: ato 'vācyatve lakṣyatvaṃ na syāditi prasaṅgaḥ praśithilamūlaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4743: tathā brahmaṇo 'vācyasyāpi svayaṃprakāśatvena prasiddhasya lakṣyatvaṃ sambhavatītyata āha- mādhuryādīti // *3,170*
GSP33nysu__1u:4752: nahi gośabdo 'nekārtha iti na kasyapi vācakaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4756: mādhuryādiviśeṣa iti ca na padaṃ kintu vākyameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:4766: yathā ca dhvaniviśeṣāṇāṃ mandavyutpattibhiraviditā api śrutisvarajātirāgādiśabdā
GSP33nysu__1u:4768: prasiddhā vācakāḥ śabdāḥ kathaṃ na syuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4770: iti vacanamātmano vyutpattyabhāvakhyāpanārthaṃ śāradānindayā pratyavāyārjanārthaṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:4775: yathoktam“vākyārtho lakṣyamāṇo hi sarvatraiveti naḥ sthitiḥ'; /
GSP33nysu__1u:4779: ato laukikavākyārthavadavācyamapi lakṣyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha- vākyārtho 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4786: kintu kenacicchabdena vācyameva kenacicchabdena lakṣyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4789: brahmaṇo vākyārthatvaṃ tu saṃsargatvasya saṃsṛṣṭatvasya vānaṅgīkārādayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4791: evaṃ vyabhicāraṃ nirasya susthā prasaṅgamūlabhūtā vyāptirityāha- nāvācyamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4795: athavā brahmaṇo 'vācyatve tasya vastutvameva na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4812: tathāca yata ityādikaiḥ padairbrahmaiva vadankathaṃ punastasyāvācyatvaṃ śrutyarthatayā brūyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4816: syādevaṃ svakriyāvirodho yadi yata ityādiśabdairbrahma vacanavṛttyoktavā tasyāvācyatvamucyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4818: kiṃ nāma yata ityādiśabdairlakṣyamevetyataḥ kvāsti svakriyāvirodha ityata āha- yeneti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4819: yena lakṣyamiti proktaṃ lakṣyaśabdena so 'vadat // MAnuv_1,1.123ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:4823: atha lakṣyaśabdenāpi lakṣyate na tūcyata iti brūyāttadā kiṃ tadityapekṣāyāṃ śabdāntaraṃ brūyādityanavasthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4824: atha yāvatpadajātaṃ brahmaṇi prayujyate tatsarvamapi lakṣaṇayaiveti parihāre kuto 'navastheti cenna /

GSP33nysu__1u:8085: athavā antaryāmyadhikaraṇe pṛthivyādiṣu sthitevarkṣyamāṇatvānnedamārambhaṇīyamityāśaṅkayātra śaktiprerakatvena tatra tu sattādipradatvena tattadantargatatvamucyata ityanenācaṣṭe /
GSP33nysu__1u:8086: athavā antaḥsthatvādhikaraṇenedaṃ gatārthamityāśaṅkaya tatra candrādikatipayapadārthāntarasthitatvam atra tu sarvapadārthāntargatatvamabhidhīyata iti pratipādyabhedametenāha /
GSP33nysu__1u:8091: tadatra yadi sādhyaṃ syāttadā 'rbhakaukastvādityākṣepānupapattiradṛśyatvādyadhikaraṇena gatārthatā e(?)
GSP33nysu__1u:8097: prakṛṣṭo bodho yasmāditi vā pacādyajantatvena vā prabodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8103: ātmānaṃ parasmai śaṃsatīti śaṃsanakriyāyāmātmanaḥ sarvagatasya karmatvena śarīrasya kartṛtvena vyapadeśācca na śārīro 'yaṃ sarvagataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8105: nahi devadattaḥ chidāyāṃ kartā karmāpi bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8106: tatra kiṃ karmakartṛbhāvo bhedavyāpta uta neti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8114: tathātve ca devadattaṃ grāmaṃ gacchatīti dvitīyā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8117: yato devadatto grāmaṃ gacchati tasyāpi devadattasamavetagatikriyāphalavibhāgaśālitvena karmatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8118: tathāca devadattaḥ kauśāmbīṃ pāṭalīputraṃ gacchatīti prayogaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8167: atha jñānāśrayaḥ kartā sukhādiviśiṣṭaḥ karmeti cet, (na) /
GSP33nysu__1u:8169: kiṃ ca yuñjānasya nirupādhikamātmānaṃ paśyato 'haṃpratyayo nānyakarmaka ityakarmako vā'tmakarmako vābhyupagantavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8171: aparastu ghaṭādisannikṛṣṭena cakṣurādinopajanitaṃ vijñānaṃ tritayaprakāśarūpaṃ karmatayā viṣayam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8183: naca tadeva svātmānaṃ prati pūrvamaparaṃ ceti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8205: prakāśamānaṃ karmatayaiva prakāśata iti vadantaṃ prati viśeṣaṇavaiyarthyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8207: kiṃ cātmā yadi tadaviṣayo 'pi tatra prakāśate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8208: hanta tarhi rūpajñāne raso 'pi kasmānna prakāśate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8219: tadevaṃ kartṛkarmabhāvo na bhedavyāpta iti siddham / *3,620*
GSP33nysu__1u:8224: yāvekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ karmakartārau tayorbheda ityastyeva vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8227: tataḥ kiṃ labdhamiti ceddoṣadvayaṃ parihṛtamiti krameṇāha- abhedo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8228: abhedo 'pi viśeṣe syād balī so 'pyanapoditaḥ // MAnuv_1,2.3cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:8237: yathā hi na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtānītyautsargiko bhūtahiṃsāniṣedho 'gnīṣomīyapaśuhiṃsāvidhināpodyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8239: nanvevaṃ tarhi prameyatvānityatvayorapyevaṃ vaktuṃ śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:8245: sāmānyaviṣayeṇa hi pramāṇenārthe pratīte sati viśeṣaviṣayeṇāpavādo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8246: tataśca sarvataḥ prasaktā buddhistadviṣayaṃ parityajyānyatra viśrāmyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8247: naca sarvabhūtahiṃsāniṣedhasyeva prameyatvānityatvavyāpteḥ kenāpi pramāṇena prāptirasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8251: evaṃ tarhi karmarkatṛbhāvo 'pi bhedābhedābhyāṃ saha vyavasthita evopalabdha iti kathamatrāpyutsargāpavādanyāyasyāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8254: sa tāvadāpātato virodhādbhedena ghaṭanīyo vā viśeṣeṇa vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8258: ato bhedaḥ sāmānyataḥ prāpnoti viśeṣastvapavādeneti yuktamuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8260: sopādhikasambandhasya sādhanāṅgatābhāvavat sopādhikavyabhicārasyāpi na dūṣaṇāṅgatvamiti kimatrālaukikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8268: etad bhāvābhidhaṃ liṅgaṃ kriyāliṅge tataḥ param /
GSP33nysu__1u:8273: yāvantaḥ śabdāḥ kvacitpratīke sthitivācinaste sarve 'pyanenopalakṣyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8286: ata eva kriyā kriyayā bhāvo bhāvena vyākhyāyata iti parāstam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8290: ityadhikaraṇe pratipādyā śrutirnāma na tu liṅgam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8291: tarhi pādāntarbhāvo na sambhavatītyata uktam- liṅgādhiketi //
GSP33nysu__1u:8293: yathā prathamapāde 'ntastaddharmopadeśāditi liṅganirṇayo bahunāmasamanvayalābhārthaḥ tathā bahuliṅgasamanvayalābhārtho nāmavicāro 'tra na viruddhayata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8302: atra“yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8303: mṛtyuryasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra saḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:8315: kiñca carācaragrahaṇāditi heturatra sarvaṃ vāttīti kaṇṭhoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8317: nanvevaṃ tarhi śrutyanugamāya sarvagrahaṇāditi kuto na kṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8326: lakṣaṇaṃ ca lakṣyeṇa brahmaṇābhinnamiti lakṣaṇasūtre pratipāditam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8329: anityatvāt kriyāṇāṃ tu kathameva svarūpatā // MAnuv_1,2.5cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:8338: yatkhalu yasya janakaṃ na tasyāsau janako,
GSP33nysu__1u:8339: yacca tasya vināśakaṃ na tasyāsau vināśaka iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8344: tato yadi nāma sarvagatatvādīnāṃ yāvaddravyabhāvināmabhedaḥ tathāpi na kriyāṇāmasau yujyata iti / *3,632*
GSP33nysu__1u:8346: iti cet sa viśeṣo 'pi kriyāśaktayātmanā sthiraḥ // MAnuv_1,2.6ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:8350: na kevalamīśvaraḥ sthiro 'pi tu sa tadīyo viśeṣo dharmo 'pi kriyārūpaḥ sthitaro yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8351: atra(tu) kriyāsthiretyetāvadeva vaktavyaṃ viśeṣa iti tu kriyāyāḥ parameśvaraikye 'pyuktavakṣyamāṇanyāyena taddharmatayāpyaṅgīkaraṇīyeti jñāpayitum
GSP33nysu__1u:8352: na kevalaṃ sa viśeṣaḥ sarvagatatvādiḥ sthiraḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:8353: kintu kriyāpi pārameśvarī sthirā yata iti vā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8360: īśvarasya tatkriyāyāśca apratyakṣatvena tadanityatvasya pratyakṣeṇa pratyetumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8372: kriyātvasya nityatvena vinā vṛttau bādhakābhāvādaprayojakatā ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:8385: kiñca nityo 'pi īśvaraparispandaḥ kadācidabhivyakteḥ kadācidevopalabhyata ityaṅgīkāre na bādhakaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8390: na hīśvaraparispandakriyā kadāpi na saṃyogavibhāgalakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ janayatīti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8406: evaṃ ca yathānekakālavartinyapi kriyā kadācitsaṃyogādyārabhate na yāvatsattvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8419: astu tarhi nityatve bādhakasadbhāvāditi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8421: yadi sṛṣṭisamaye 'pi saṃhārakriyā vidyeta tadā tathaiva śrutyādāvupalabhyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:8423: kiñca yadīśvarakriyā nityā syāttarhi kriyāyāḥ saṃyogavibhāgau prati anapekṣakāraṇatvāttadutpattisātatyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8424: api ceśvarakriyā saṃyogavibhāgau karoti na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8428: svasattāyā idaṃ prathamatābhāvena saṃyogādiviśeṣasya vivakṣitakṣaṇādapi pūrvamutpattiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8431: uttarasaṃyogasya karmavināśakatvena kṛtasaṃyogasya karmaṇo 'vasthānānupapatteścetyata uktaṃ śaktayātmaneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8434: ataḥ tena rūpeṇa sthirā sā yadā vyajyate tadā vyavahārālambanaṃ tattatkāryajananī ca bhavatīti na kaściddoṣa iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8445: yadi sṛṣṭisamaye 'pi saṃhārakriyā syāttadā tathā vyavahriyeteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8448: yadapi jananavināśau yugapatsyātāmiti tadapi vyaktayavasthāyāmeva śakterjanakatvādanupapannam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8449: yacca kriyāyā nityatve saṃyogavibhāgotpattisātatyaprasañjanaṃ tadapyevameva parihṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8452: nanu kiṃ sāmagrī tameva paṭaṃ punarjanayatu(yet)
GSP33nysu__1u:8455: paṭaprāgabhāvasyāpi sāmagrīniviṣṭatvāttasya ca paṭotpattyā vinaṣṭatvena sāmagṣā vikalatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8461: yadapīśvarakriyā saṃyogavibhāgau karoti na veti pṛṣṭham /
GSP33nysu__1u:8469: nanu saṃhārakāle kriyā vyaktā (atha) na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8477: nityamapi parameśvarecchādikaṃ sahakārisadbhāva eva kāryakārīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:8480: necchādimātraṃ saṃhārādikāraṇaṃ kintu sañjihīrṣādikam uta saṃhārādiviśeṣaviśiṣṭaṃ tadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:8486: sati saṃhārādau sañjihīrṣādikaṃ tataḥ saṃhārādiriti parasparāśrayaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8496: nanu pārameśvarī jñānādilakṣaṇā saṃhārādikriyā pareṇāpi nityetyaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8507: mahato mahattvamapi paramapūjyatvamiti kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8508: virodhādubhayāṅgīkāro nocita iti cet tarhi prathamaprāptatvādaṇutvameva grāhyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8514: dvitīye tvanivṛttaḥ sadā vyavahārādiprasaṅga ityata āha- śaktiteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8519: sa ca viśeṣaḥ parasparaṃ viśeṣiṇā ca yadi bhinnaḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:8520: tadā śaktivyaktayorapi kiṃ bhedo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8536: asti tu parameśvarādikriyāyā nityatve tadityāha- kriyādiśceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8537: ... kriyādiśca svabhāva iti hi śrutiḥ // MAnuv_1,2.7ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:8544: jñānaṃ nityaṃ kriyā nityā balaṃ śaktiḥ parātmanaḥ // MAnuv_1,2.7cd // *3,649*
GSP33nysu__1u:8547: athavā pūrvā śrutiḥ śaktireva kriyetyatra paṭhitā uttarā tu kriyāyā nityatve /
GSP33nysu__1u:8552: anyakriyā kimanityaivetyato vivekaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa darśayati- śaktīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8560: tataśca jñānakriyādiśaktiḥ yāvatkālabhāvinī tāvatkālabhāvi jñānādikamapītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8568: sphoṭādikāryaṃ prati śaktimānapi dahano dehasaṃyogādisahakārivirahāt na tadajījanaditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:8602: kriyāpratīteranumititvaṃ indriyavyāpārasya cānyatropakṣīṇatvaṃ apratyakṣatāyāṃ pramāṇataḥ siddhāyāṃ kalpyate anyathā vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8627: kiṃ ca paramāṇukarmāpratyakṣatāyāmapi tadeva prayojakaṃ kiṃ na kalpyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8629: ekasyāmapi karmavyaktāvutpannāyāṃ calatītipratyayaḥ syāt, iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:8633: tarhi karmaṇo 'pi tathā kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8636: paṭagrahaṇa eva ca indriyavyāpāropayoga ityapi kalpanāprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8637: api(?) ca saṃyogavibhāgau dvayāśrayāviti parasya matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8643: nipatataḥ śyenasya pūrvadeśavibhāgotpattau utpatataścottaradeśasaṃyogajanane sthāṇukarmaṇaḥ kāraṇatāyogāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8647: sthāṇukarmaṇā hi śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyogavibhāgotpattyanupapattau karmāntarameva tadanuguṇaṃ śyene kalpanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8649: yadgataṃ hi kāryamupalabhyate tadgataṃ kāraṇamapītyautsargiko nyāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8650: śyenakarmaṇaiva kalpitena sarvasyopapattau na sthāṇukarmopayoga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:8652: tathāhi, kiṃ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvadapyupayoge satyeva liṅgamanumāpakaṃ ityetāvatyanumānasāmagrī,
GSP33nysu__1u:8655: kiñca yo yenanāvinābhūtaḥ sa kvacidupalabhyamāno 'nupayogāttaṃ na gamayatītyalaukikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8656: dvitīye tu kathaṃ na sthāṇau karmānumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8664: iha tu saṃyogavibhāgalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa sthāṇāveva karmaṇyanumite kathaṃ kalpanāgauraveṇa tadapanayanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8670: atra hi sthāṇau pratītau saṃyogavibhāgāvakāraṇakāveva syātāmiti vā śaṅkanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8674: tattadavayavagataparityāgenānyagatasya kāraṇatāyāḥ kvāpyanupalabdhatvena nirmūlāyāḥ śaṅkāyā anudayāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8679: kiñca saṃyogādinā kriyānumāne yāvatsattvaṃ calati pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8690: api cāpratyakṣe vyomni saṃyogavibhāgāvapi apratyakṣāviti patati patatrī gagana iti pratyayo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8691: viyati vitatālokāvayavini bahuvihagavibhāgasaṃyoganibandhano 'sau pratyaya iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:8695: yadi ca mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasyeva devadattasyāpi gatiranumeyā syāt tadobhayatrāpi calatipratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8698: api ca kārmakāraṇādeva saṃyogavibhāgotpattyupapattau kiṃ madhye karmakalpanayetyanavakḷptireva karmaṇaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8700: tasya saṃyogaviśeṣādeḥ svāśraye tatsamavete vā kāryārambhakatvasyānyatra niścitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8708: tarhi tathaiva paratrārambhakatvamapi kuto na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8717: // oṃ guhāṃ praviṣyāvātmānau hi taddarśanāt oṃ //
GSP33nysu__1u:8718: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt / BBs_1,2.11 /
GSP33nysu__1u:8719: ṛtaṃ pibantāviti vākyaṃ kiṃ jīveśvarau pratipādayati kiṃvā parameśvarameveti saṃśaye jīveśvarāviti tāvatprāptam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8725: jīveśvarapakṣe tu chatrinyāyenopacāro bhaviṣyatītyevaṃ prāpte paramātmānamekameva pratipādayatīdaṃ vākyaṃ,
GSP33nysu__1u:8736: naca paramātmani svagatabhedo yujyata iti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:8739: sā ca paramātmanyabhedena ekatvasaṅkhayayā ca viruddhayata iti cet, na /
GSP33nysu__1u:8741: atha dvitvaṃ dravyāntaravidhurasya na yujyate virodhāditi matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8744: kintu dvitvaṃ caikasya nirbhedasya ekatvādhāramātrasya ca yujyate / *3,674*
GSP33nysu__1u:8745: kathamityapekṣāyāṃ tatpradaśarnāya viśeṣaṇācceti sūtraṃ prakārāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe- yaḥ seturiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8766: iti paramātmanyeva samanvayaṃ pratijñātavatā sūtrakāreṇa sa eva vivaraṇavākyaiḥ prapañcanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8768: bādhake sati nāyaṃ doṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:8793: sūtre bhāvasyaiva pratijñānāt kriyayā anukterityato 'ntaraśabdamubhayārthatayā vyākhyāti- antariti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8811: tatkathaṃ śrutāvanuktaṃ ramaṇakartṛtvaṃ sūtrakṛtā pratijñāyata ityata āha- ramaṇaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8814: na kevalaṃ sūtre 'pi tu śrutau ceti dvitīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8816: ādeyam upādeyaṃ sukhaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ ca māti anubhavatīti nirvacanenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8833: yadi hi sukhābhidhānādityeva brūyāt tadā sukhasyānyatrāpi sadbhāvena vyabhicāraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8839: sukhena śreṣṭho hi tadā syāt yadi tatsukhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhavedityarthād,
GSP33nysu__1u:8845: svarūpeṇāpi sukhena viśeṣaśaktayā tadvān bhavatīti jñāpayitumiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8849: uktā ca sukhasya viśiṣṭatā śrutāvityāha- brahmatvaṃ ceti // *3,681*
GSP33nysu__1u:8859: akṣyādityayoragnireva niyāmakatayātrocyata iti yat pūrvapakṣiṇoktaṃ tannirākartuṃ sūtram- anavasthiterasambhavācca netara iti // *3,683*
GSP33nysu__1u:8861: jīvasyāgnerjīvāntaraniyāmakatve tasyāpi niyāmakāntareṇa bhāvyamityanavasthiteḥ ubhayorjīvatvasāmyena niyamyaniyāmakabhāvāsambhavācca nāgnirakṣyādityasthatayā atrocyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8865: tatra yadi parasyānavisthityasambhavau asmākamapi kuto na bhavataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8867: tathā na parasyāpītyataḥ sūtraṃ samyagvyākhyātuṃ pīṭhamāracayati- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8880: nanu brahmādīnāṃ niyāmakatvaṃ mānuṣādīnāṃ niyamyatvamityeṣa viśeṣaḥ teṣāṃ svabhāva eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:8883: svamate ca kā nāma parameśvarāpekṣetyata āha- cetanānāmiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8898: kimato yadyevaṃ svavyāghātena vinā sūtrārtho niṣpanna ityāha- anyonyeti //
