GSP33nysu__1u:12151: nahi vedādṛte 'nyena brahma niścayena vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12154: tathāpi niruktamityanena virodhātsamyak kātsnaryena vaktumaśakyatvata ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12155: nanu vedetarapramāṇenāniruktamiti kuto na vyākhyāyate / na /
GSP33nysu__1u:12165: śleṣaṇa ityasya vādhikaraṇe lyuṭi kṛte rūpametat /
GSP33nysu__1u:12170: na vidyate vijñānaṃ sakalaviśeṣāvagāhijīvajñānaṃ yadviṣaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12193: abhavaditi vacanādbrahmaṇaḥ sattvādikaṃ sādīti śaṅkānirāsāyoktam- sadeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12195: tarhi kathamabhavaditi prayoga ityata āha- vyaktiriti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12201: nṛṇāmupadeṣyṛpuruṣāpekṣayā sṛṣṭau satyāveva bhavet hi yasmā(dasmā)tkāraṇāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12202: atra ca nityaguṇe 'pi brahmaṇi sadādikamabhavaditiprayogo yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12204: tat brahma mūrtāmūrtātmakaṃ viśvaṃ sṛṣṭvā tatprerakatvena nānārūpaistadeva viśvaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:12206: sat athedānīmupadeṣyṝṇāmupadeśyānāṃ ca śaṇīrendriyavattve sati pratītasattvādiguṇamabhavaditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:12209: “so 'yaṃ vihāra iha me tanubhṛtsvabhāvasambhūtaye bhavati bhūtikṛdeva bhūtyāḥ'; iti / *4,387*
GSP33nysu__1u:12214: dvibhāgaṃ brahmeti yannirākṛtaṃ tasyopasaṃhāra eka iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12216: ato na brahmopādānatvaṃ prakṛtyadhikaraṇārtha iti (sambandhaḥ) śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12231: bahu syāmiti tasyaiva hyuktamārgeṇa yujyate // MAnuv_1,4.80ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12262: dṛśyate mandadṛṣṭayaiva sa sarga iti kathyate // MAnuv_1,4.81 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12265: sa sarga iti kathyata ityetāvatpariṇāmavāde 'pi samam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12286: avikṛtamevānyadanyātmanā dṛśyata ityasambhavi ityata uktam- mṛṣeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12290: mandā bhavati dṛṣṭiryayā sā mandadṛṣṭistayā māyayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12307: sā mandadṛṣṭistasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ tato 'nyagā // MAnuv_1,4.82ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12309: viśvasya brahmavivartatve nirākartavye mandadṛṣṭayāśrayapraśno 'nupapanna ityata uktam- seti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12313: mandadṛṣṭāvāśrayānirūpaṇādinā nirākṛtāyāṃ sarvamidaṃ nirākṛtaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12317: māyāvādino hi kecit brahmaiva svāvidyayā jagadākāreṇa vivartate svapnādivaditi manyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:12322: jīvā eva svāvidyayā pratyekaṃ prapañcākāreṇa brahma vibhrāmyanti,
GSP33nysu__1u:12326: iha jīvagetyanuktvā tato 'nyageti vadatā sa jīvaḥ kiṃ brahmaṇo 'nyo('nanyo vā)
GSP33nysu__1u:12328: tatra dvitīyaḥ prathame praviśatīti taṃ dūṣayati- brahmaṇaścediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12343: anyathā śuktijñānavato 'pi tadajñānaṃ na viruddhayateti bhramānucchedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12353: yadi brahmavyatiriktajīvāśrayā viśvabhrāntiraṅgīkriyate tadā bhrāntyāśrayasya bhrāntikalpitatvāyogāt jīvabrahmaṇoranyatā svābhāvikītyāpannam
GSP33nysu__1u:12357: nādehayogino dṛṣṭiriti tat kāraṇaṃ svataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.83ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12362: kintu dehayogarahitasyendriyābhāvātatpadārthadarśanaṃ na sambhavatītyato hetoḥ āropakāraṇamindriyaṃ tadāśrayo dehaśca kalpanāṃ vinaivāstītyaṅgīkaraṇīyam
GSP33nysu__1u:12363: nahi sukhādivadrajatādivadvāsya prapañcasya sākṣimātrasiddhatvaṃ paro manyate dehendriyāṇāmapyutpattimatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12365: astu brahmavyatiriktānāṃ jīvānāṃ sakāraṇānāṃ tadīyadehendriyāṇāṃ cābhrāntikalpitatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12366: draṣṭṛtvena darśanakaraṇatvena tadāśrayatvena tatkāraṇatvena ca bhrānteḥ pūrvabhāvitvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12367: tadatiriktāstu prapañco 'stu bhrāntikalpita ityata āha- dehina iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12368: dehinaḥ kāraṇayutā dehāśca yadi na bhramāt // MAnuv_1,4.83cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:12381: bhrāntyā brahmaṇo bhinnasya bāhyādhyātmikārthabhrama iti hi manyata ityata āha- bhedo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12385: kintu jīvabrahmaṇorbhedo 'pi yadi bhramajo bhramasiddhaḥ aṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12442: neha nānetyādiśrutyā sarvasyāpi viyadādeḥ prapañcasya bhrāntikalpitatvābhidhānāt ityāśaṅkayedamuditam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12448: yadi viyadādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhramasiddhaṃ syāt tadā tadantaḥpātitvādiyaṃ śrutiśca tathā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12449: bhramāropitaṃ viyadādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhramasiddhaṃ syāt tadā tadantaḥpātitvādiyaṃ śrutiśca tathā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12451: bhramaśabdaḥ jñāne arthe ca pareṣāṃ prasiddha iti bhramatva ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12452: yadyapyayamarthaḥ prathamasūtre varṇitaḥ tathāpi tatrādhyātmikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ (prapañco)
GSP33nysu__1u:12455: nanu sarvo 'pyayaṃ prapañco bhrāntisiddho 'pi vyāvahāriko bhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:12457: vyāvahārikatā cāsya syādabādhyatva eva hi // MAnuv_1,4.86ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12463: yato 'sya prapañcasya vyāvahārikatā tu abādhyatva eva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12489: nanu tathāpyasatyasya svāpnakāminīsambhogādeḥ caramadhātuvisargādyarthakriyākāritvadarśanāt vyāptivikalastarka ityata āha- na ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12494: tarhi mama matena vyāptibhaṅgo 'stu mayā mṛṣātvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt iti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:12496: nanu kathaṃ bādarāyaṇasya na mṛṣā svapna ityata āha- vāsaneti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12499: tasya svapnasyāpi māyāmātramiti vadatā sūtrakāreṇa vāsanājanitatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt idaṃ jñāyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:12500: yat na tasya svapno mṛṣābhimata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12502: kiñca śrutyanusārī hi sūtrakārasya siddhāntaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12503: śrutyā ca svāpnārthasya kartāraṃ vadantyā satyatvamevābhipretamiti na mṛṣātvaṃ sūtrakṛto 'bhimatamityāha- sa hīti // *4,422*
GSP33nysu__1u:12508: iti sūtrakṛtaiva tanmithyātvasya vakṣyamāṇatvādityato vāha- vāsaneti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12513: tasyāgāminaḥ sūtrasya vāsanājanitatvapratipādakatvena asmābhiraṅgīkṛtatvāditi vā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12514: na kevalaṃ vakṣyamāṇopapattivaśāt mṛṣātvaṃ na sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12541: tathā sarpe samāropitāyāḥ kusumamālāyāḥ santoṣakāritā upalabhyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:12560: sā ca viṣadravyeṇeva bhayādināpi bhavatīti na bādhyasya(syāpi)
GSP33nysu__1u:12562: nanu kiṃ jñānamātraṃ bhayādijanakaṃ kiṃvā viṣayāvacchinnam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12572: gurūṇāṃ ṭīkāṃ paṭhati ityādau viśeṣaṇasyāpi kārakatvamasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12591: kiñca vilakṣaṇasamāgrījanmanorjñānayoryathā parokṣatvāparokṣatvarūpo viśeṣaḥ viṣayopādhinā vinābhyupagamyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:12593: api ca sarpajñānasya vilakṣaṇārthakriyā na svagatenātiśayena vinopapadyate / nahi
GSP33nysu__1u:12595: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ satyasarpajñāne samīcīnayā sāmagṣā jātaḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:12597: ato viṣayāntarbhāvamantareṇa svagatenaiva viśeṣeṇa sarpādijñānasya bhayādijanakatvānna sarpasya kiñcitkaratvamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12598: tadevaṃ yatrātharkriyā niścitā na tatra mithyātvam,
GSP33nysu__1u:12599: yatra tu mithyātvaṃ na tatrārthakriyeti na tarkamūlavyāpteḥ kvāpi bhaṅgaḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:12603: nanvarthakriyākāritvaṃ yathā vipakṣānmithyābhūtādvayāvṛttam evaṃ sapakṣādbrahmaṇo 'pi vyāvṛttatvādasādhāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12605: tasyāpi prapañcāntarbhāvena vipratipannatvādityata āha- brahma tviti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12606: brahma tvarthakriyākāri parataḥ svata eva vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12609: tena māyāvādinaiva brahma prapañcādapyatiśayenārthakriyākāryamaṅgīkṛtameva hi janmādisūtre jagatkāraṇatvenoktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12611: nanu mayāṅgīkriyamāṇaṃ brahmaṇo 'rthakriyākāritvaṃ ca na svābhāvikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12615: ataḥ kathamāpādakasya sapakṣapraveśa ityata āha- parata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12623: brahmaṇo'rthakriyākāritvaṃ parata ityasya nāyamarthaḥ dāruyantrasyeva parādhīnam iti,
GSP33nysu__1u:12625: kintu gagane malinateva niṣkriyā eva brahmaṇi māyāsambandhādarthakriyā(di)
GSP33nysu__1u:12627: na caivaṃvidhena sapakṣapraveśo bhavatyāpādakasyetyata āha paratastva iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12644: nacaivaṃ brahmaṇo 'rthakriyāyāḥ paratastve pramāṇamasti yadbādhakaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12647: paratastve ca prāmāṇyasyānavasthāpātena na pramā niścīyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:12650: evaṃ śrutibalena parastve 'rthakriyāyāḥ svīkṛte tadabhidhātrī“sa idaṃ sarvamasṛjata';
GSP33nysu__1u:12654: iti śrutiretacchativirodhātparatastve na prameti kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12660: na hi sampratipattiḥ syādatastiṣṭhatu sā pramā // MAnuv_1,4.90 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12675: nahi kālavilambena bādhitārthaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavatīti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12677: tathāpi prapañcamithyātvasādhanāya tadupanyāsaḥ kuto na kāryaḥ ityata āha- na hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12678: na hi vipratipannena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ kvacit // MAnuv_1,4.91ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12685: anyathā bhavatāmapi prapañcamithyātvanirākaraṇe tatsatyatvasādhane ca pramāṇābhāvena kathābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12687: na tāvatsatyaṃ māṃ prati vaktumucitam mayā satyasya sādhakatvānaṅgīkārāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:12688: yatsatyaṃ na tatra kriyā'veśaḥ yatra ca kriyā'veśo na tatsatyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12689: naca vācyaṃ sākṣiṇaḥ satyasya sādhakatvaṃ tvayāṅgīkṛtamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12696: samyak sampratipannaṃ tanna vivatarmamataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.91c-f //
GSP33nysu__1u:12701: hiśabdaḥ, sarvaṃ vastu jñātatayājñātatayā vā sākṣicaitanyasya viṣaya evetyāditatprasiddhidyotakaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12707: viśvasya satyatāmapi tenaiva sādhayāma ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12711: tatkathaṃ kimapyanaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ māṃ prati sākṣiṇaḥ sādhakatvaṃ tvayāṅgīkṛtamityucyata ityata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12722: ādye('pi) kiñcidapi nāṅgīkṛtamiti pakṣahāneḥ ātmano 'naṅgīkartṛtāpi nāṅgīkṛteti dvitīya evāṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12727: vastutastu vayaṃ sarvato nivṛttāḥ svataḥ siddhe cidātmani brahmatatve kevale bhāramavalambya caritārthāḥ sukhamāsmahe /
GSP33nysu__1u:12728: ye tu svaparikalpitasādhanadūṣaṇādivyavasthayā vicāramavatārya tattvaṃ nirṇetumicchanti tānprati brūmo na sādhvīyaṃ bhavatāṃ vicāravyavastheti
GSP33nysu__1u:12735: bhavatkalpitavyavasthaiva vyāhatatvādasādhvī bhavadvayavastheti brūmo na punaratra kimapi pramāṇamaṅgīkurma iti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:12738: kiṃ parakīyavyavasthāyā asādhutvasvayamavabuddhaya paraṃ prati bodhyate 'navabuddhayaiva vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12771: na kevalamāntarasya sukhādeḥ kintu bāhyasya gaganādeśceti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12775: sākṣītyevokte sākṣiṇo 'prāmāṇyāt prāmāṇye vā pramāṇatritvabhaṅgāt na viśvasatyatvaṃ pramitamiti śaṅkā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12779: naca sākṣirā vinā bāhyapratyakṣamātreṇaindriyakāṇāmapi satyatā siddhayatītyataḥ sākṣītyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12790: pareṣāṃ ca iha bhūtale ghaṭābhāva iti / *4,459*
GSP33nysu__1u:12799: kiñcaivamapi nehāloka itīhālokatryaṇukamiti ca pratyayo duḥsampādaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12817: śabdo hi śrotreṇa prāpto vā gṛhyate 'prāpto vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12820: sā hi na tāvacchrotrasya gamanena sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12830: naca śaṅkhaśravasormadhye śaṅkho vā tadārabdhadravyaṃ vāsti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12851: kiñca śabdo varṇātmā vā pakṣo dhvanirūpo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12855: ghaṭādīnāmekendriyagrāhyatvābhāve 'pi ātmanastathātvavad dravyasyaiva sato bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatve 'pi virodhābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12856: yadi (śabdo) dravyaṃ syāt bāhyendriyagrāhyo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12874: śrotrasya cakṣuṣa iva gatvāgrāhitve śabde diksaṃśayo na syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12896: śabdo na vāyavīyaḥ viśeṣaguṇatve sati tvagindriyāvedyatvādgandhavaditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:12909: ātmasamavetasyaiva vīcītaraṅganyāyena mūlapratyabhijñānopapattau vipakṣe bādhakābhāvāc ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:12916: pāde me sukhaṃ śirasi me duḥkhaṃ mano me duḥkhitamiti darśanātsukhādiṣu vyabhicārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12926: kiñcātra sarvatra sāhacaryadarśane saṅkoca eva dravyāntarakalpanāyā laghīyān /
GSP33nysu__1u:12929: aṣṭadravyātiriktāśrita ityeva sādhane guṇādivṛttisāmānyādapi vyāvṛttatvenāsādhāraṇatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12930: śabdāśrayaḥ itarebhyo bhidyate śabdāśrayatvāt vyatirekeṇa pṛthivīvat iti prayoga iti cet(na) /
GSP33nysu__1u:12933: abhāvasya sādhyatvādabhāvābhāvasya ca bhāvatvena pratiyogyanapekṣatayā vyāptigrahaṇasambhavānna doṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:12943: tadbhāgā eva diśo na dravyāntaramiti tāsāmapi sākṣivedya(siddha)taiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:12946: na tāvatā tasya traikālikabādhavaidhuryalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ siddhayati,
GSP33nysu__1u:12949: sākṣisiddhasya na kvāpi bādhyatvaṃ tadadoṣataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.94cd // *4,494*
GSP33nysu__1u:12971: sākṣiṇa eva hi sākṣiprāmāṇyagrāhakatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12976: yena sarvakāleṣvabādhyatvaṃ sākṣiṇā pratīyata ityata āha- kālo hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12977: kālo hi sākṣipratyakṣaḥ suṣuptau ca pratītitaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.95cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:12981: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ sukhamahamasvāpsamiti suṣuptyutthitasya parāmarśadarśanāt na hyananubhūtasya parāmarśo yujyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:12992: kintu tadaivātītaṃ suṣuptikālamanubhūya tadātano duḥkhābhāvo 'numīyata ityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12995: utthitasya kiṃ sākṣiṇātītakālānubhavamabhyupagamya sukhaparāmarśo nirākriyate uta pramāṇāntareṇa /
GSP33nysu__1u:13001: atītānāgatakālayostu sākṣivedyatvābhāvātkathaṃ traikālikābādhyabhāvaḥ sākṣiṇā prapañcasya siddhayatītyata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13022: tadetaditi sarvaṃ ca dṛśyaṃ vā smṛtigocaram /
GSP33nysu__1u:13023: sākṣisiddhena kālena khacitaṃ hyeva vartate // MAnuv_1,4.97 //
GSP33nysu__1u:13024: tasmānna taṃ vinā kiñcit smartuṃ draṣṭumathāpi vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13027: yasmāttaditi smṛtigocarametaditi dṛśyaṃ vā sarvamapi sākṣisiddhena kālena khacitaṃ sambaddhameva vartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13028: tasmāttaṃ kālaṃ vinā kālapratibhāsaṃ vinā kiñcidvayāptyādikaṃ smartuṃ vā dharmyādikaṃ draṣṭumiti vā na śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13030: anubhūtavyāptikasya puṃso 'nubhūyamāne smaryamāṇe vā dharmiṇi vyāpyadharmasyānubhavāt smaraṇādvā prāganubhūtāṃ vyāptiṃ smṛtavato vyāptasya pakṣe 'nusandhānamanumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13035: na punā rūpamityeva tattā ca pūrvakālasambandhitaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:13037: anumānādijanyo 'pyabhūditi vā bhavatīti vā bhaviṣyatīti vodeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13042: tathāca vyāptyādiviṣayā api pratītayo na kālāviśiṣṭaṃ svārthaṃ gocacayituṃ śaknuvanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13047: tasya kālasya nityasiddhervyāptyādigrahaṇa eva sākṣiṇā siddhatvānna kālānumānasyāvasaro bhavet aniścite hyarthe nyāsyāvasaraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13048: niścitaviṣayaṃ tu siddhasādhanatvāt pareṣāmāśrayāsiddham asmākaṃ tvasaṅgatamiti / *4,505*
GSP33nysu__1u:13049: evaṃ kālaviṣayāṇi sarvānumānāni sāmānyato nirākṛtya viśeṣato nirākaroti- tadetaditi //
GSP33nysu__1u:13056: tathā yugapadāgatau ayugapadāgatau cireṇāgataḥ kṣipramāgataḥ iti pratyayāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13075: tathāca liṅgapratītāveva liṅginaḥ kālasya sphuraṇātkathaṃ tena tadanumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13084: vipratipannaṃ prati parāparādipratyayānāṃ kāryatvena nimittānumānamidaṃ bhāṣyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13089: ādye tannityasiddhestasya kālasya prāganumānānnityena sākṣiṇā siddheḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13092: diśarīrāvasthā kāraṇatvena kālānumāne tannityasiddhestasya kālasambandhasya nityaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:13097: bahutvaṃ hi kālasya kiṃ paramāṇūnāmiva sahaiva,
GSP33nysu__1u:13120: ataḥ piṇḍatapanaparispandayoḥ saṃyuktasaṃyogisamavāyātmani paramparāsambandhe yaddravyaṃ nimittaṃ sa kāla iti / *4,520*
GSP33nysu__1u:13131: tadidamuktam teṣāṃ viśiṣṭapratyayānāṃ nityasiddherdravyāntarakalpānāṃ vinā svabhāvādeva siddheḥ dravyāntarānumānāvasaro na bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13143: kiñcābhāvasyāpi na bhūtalasānnidhyaṃ parapakṣe kimapi paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13144: astu vā tapanaparispandānāṃ piṇḍaṃ pratyupanāyakaṃ dravyāntaram /
GSP33nysu__1u:13148: naca taraṇipiṇḍāntakāle tāni na santyanupalambhāditi vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13157: sūryagatyupanāyakatvaṃ ca dravyasvarūpaṃ vā atīndriyaśaktirvā sahakāriśaktirvā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13174: tadā sarvaṃ sarvatra saṅkrāmayet aviśeṣāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:13181: kimayaṃ svarasambandhanibandhanaḥ kiṃ vā atiriktasambandhādhīna iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13182: dvitīye 'pi kiṃ sākṣātsambandho 'tra nimittamuta dravyāntarakṛta iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13184: sarvatra bādhakāni paryālocayanprasiddhadravyeṣu yadbādhakaṃ paśyettadaprasiddhe 'pi kalpyamāne kathaṃ nānusandadhyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13185: anusandadhānaśca tatsvābhāvyena parihāraṃ cintayankalpanāgauravavyasanamapahāya laghīyāṃsameva pakṣaṃ na kathaṃ(vā)
GSP33nysu__1u:13193: astu vā'kāśasya viśeṣaguṇavataḥ kriyopanāyakatvābhāvaḥ diśastu syāt viśeṣaguṇaśūnyatvāt vyāpakatvācca /
GSP33nysu__1u:13199: tasya viśiṣṭapratyayasya nityena niyatena prasiddhenaiva pṛthivyādinā siddhernāprasiddhe dravye 'numānāvasaro bhavediti / *4,538*
GSP33nysu__1u:13200: anye tu paramparaśabdābhyāṃ paratvāparatve guṇau yuvasthavirapiṇḍa(vartinau)
GSP33nysu__1u:13202: tau asamavāyikāraṇasaṃyogāśrayatayā nimittakāraṇāpekṣābuddhisampādakatayā vā kālamanumāpayata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13205: paratve vā yadyālambanaṃ tadā astu kālānumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13209: paro 'yamityādi prayuktavantaḥ ko 'syārtha iti pṛṣṭāḥ laukikāḥ parīkṣikāśca bahukālīna(no 'yamityādi)
GSP33nysu__1u:13212: tadbahutvādi ca kvacitsākṣiṇā kvacidanumānādinā ca jñāyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13216: vivādādhyāsitaṃ kāryaṃ viśeṣaguṇarahitadravyābhyāṃ janyate kāryatvāt antaḥkaraṇadvayasaṃyogavaditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:13223: mano manasā saṃyujyate mūrtatvāccharīravaditi ca ākālike vidyadādau sandigdhavyabhicāram / *4,547*
GSP33nysu__1u:13243: ātmavadupasaṅgrāhakaikyena dravyāṇāṃ navatvopapattiriti cettarhi diśā kālena vā sādhyaparyavasānā(sambhavā)
GSP33nysu__1u:13252: na vidyate doṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya jñānasya tena pratītasya viṣayīkṛtasyādoṣeṇa pratyakṣādinā vā pratītasya gaganādeḥ prapañcasya satyatvaṃ traikālikābādhyatvaṃ sākṣiṇā mataṃ siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:13261: nacaivaṃ ghaṭo 'sti ghaṭo nāstītipratyayānupapattiḥ paunaruktyādvayāghātācceti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13267: jñānagataṃ ca yāthārthyalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ jñānagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13269: tathāca sākṣiṇā jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇatā tadviṣayasya sakalaprapañcasya traikālikābādhyatvalakṣaṇaṃ satyatvameva gṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:13270: yadi hi jñānagocarasya nityasya vā anityasya vā sarvagatasya vā asarvagatasya vā arthasya svadeśakālaprakāropādhāvasattvā'vedanalakṣaṇo bādhaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:13272: yadi tarhi jñānasvarūpagrāhakaḥ sākṣī tatprāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇanprapañcasatyatāṃ niścinuyāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:13273: śuktirajatādijñānasvarūpagrāhako 'pi sa eveti tatprāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇan śuktirajatādikamapi satyaṃ vyavasthāpayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:13276: prapañcagocarāṇāmapi jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyābhāvātkiṃ sākṣirā gṛhyata ityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13277: tasmātsākṣiṇā prapañcasatyatāsiddhimabhilaṣatā jñānagrāhakasya sākṣiṇaḥ prāmāṇyagrāhakatvaṃ svabhāva iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13284: yadā tvarthitvena prāmāṇyaṃ nirdidhārayiṣitaṃ tadā sajātīyavijātīyasaṃvādavisaṃvādabhāvābhāvalakṣaṇayā parīkṣayā doṣabhāvaṃ niścitya
GSP33nysu__1u:13296: nanu yadi parīkṣāsahakṛtaḥsākṣī jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tadānavasthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13300: kiñca sākṣiṇo 'pyanavadhṛtapramāṇabhāvasya svayaṃ duḥsthasya na paraprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇasamārthyamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:13303: parīkṣādeśca satyatvaṃ tena hyeva mataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.99cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:13308: tena sākṣiṇaiva kevalena na tu parīkṣāyuktena(sahakṛtena) /
GSP33nysu__1u:13315: evañca yatra yatra doṣasambhāvanayā tatsandehastatra tatraiva parīkṣāpekṣā nānyatra /
GSP33nysu__1u:13320: astyatra purataḥ pānīyamiti vākyaṃ śrutavato bhavati sandehaḥ kimidaṃ viparyayādimūlamuta neti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13322: tata evārthe sandihānaḥ pratyāsīdan rūpaviśeṣādinānuminoti pānīyametaditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:13332: saṃśayābhāve ca na tatpūrvikā parīkṣeti kuto 'navasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13337: indriyaliṅgaśabdajanyeṣu jñāneṣvanādau saṃsāre dvayīṃ gatimanusandadhatsākṣī na sahasaiva pramāṇametaditi niścetuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13342: parīkṣāyāṃ cendriyaliṅgaśabdajāyāṃ pūrvanyāyena parīkṣāntaramanusarati yāvatsākṣātsvaviṣaye sukhādāvavatarati /
GSP33nysu__1u:13344: nahi jñānasvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ ca viṣayīkartuṃ svamahimnaiva śaknoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13345: tasya tu mānasyā doṣaśaṅkayā prāmāṇyagrahaṇaśaktiḥ pratibaddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13348: parīkṣayā ca pratibandhe 'pagate nijayaiva śaktyā prāmāṇyamavadhārayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:13349: nacāsya vyutpādanasyāprāmāṇye 'pi samatvāttasyāpi svato grahaṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13356: na cāprāmāṇyaṃ kvāpi parīkṣānapekṣeṇa sākṣiṇā niścitacaram /
GSP33nysu__1u:13368: yadi jñānagrāhakātiriktasya yathākathamapi praveśātprāmāṇyasya paratastvamiti matam,
GSP33nysu__1u:13369: tadā sākṣiṇa eva svataḥprāmāṇyamanyasya parata ityaṅgīkāre 'pi na kaścidvirodha iti saṅkṣepaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13374: na punarasya kadācitkutrāpi kenāpi svārthavyabhicāro na bhaviṣyatītyevaṃrūpam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13378: akasmād vinivṛttiśca kiṃ viśvasya na śaṅkayate // MAnuv_1,4.100 //
GSP33nysu__1u:13380: sākṣiṇaḥ sarvathā bādhavaidhurvalakṣaṇaprāmāṇyāgrāhakatve viśvasya pūrṇasya brahmaṇo 'pi prapañcavadvinivṛttiḥ kiṃ kasmānna śaṅkayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13394: ādye kathaṃ prapañcaviṣayāṇāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ prāmāṇyamātyantikaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13395: dvitīye brahmaṇaḥ satyatāpratipādakānāṃ śrutyādīnāmapi nātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13398: evaṃca tajjñānamapi na tattvajñānamiti na tadarthaḥ prayatnaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13399: atha kvacicchaktiḥ kvacinneti brūyāttadā niyāmakaṃ vācyamiti / *4,574*
GSP33nysu__1u:13400: nanu yadi brahma bādhārhaṃ syāttarhīyatā kālena kuto na nivṛttam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13401: tasmāditaḥpūrvaṃ bādharahitatvānnottaratrāpi bādhaḥ śaṅkayata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:13407: itaḥ pūrvaṃ tathābhāvād yadi no saṃsṛtergatiḥ // MAnuv_1,4.101ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:13410: yadi brahmaṇo nivṛttinar śaṅkayata iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13426: viśvasya viyadāderuttarakṣaṇa eva nivṛttirvināśaḥ kiṃ na śaṅkayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13439: kimatra yatpūrvaṃ nābhūttaduttaratrāpi na bhaviṣyatīti vyāptiḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:13440: kiṃvā yatpūrvaṃ na nirhetukaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ na taduttaratrāpi tathā vināśavaditi,
GSP33nysu__1u:13451: tathācākasmātkimapi na nivartata ityaṅgīkāre no saṃsṛtergatiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13457: vākyānumāditaścet syāt tatprāmāṇyaṃ ca sākṣitaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.101cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:13462: brahmaṇo 'pi nivṛttyāśaṅkāyāmāpāditāyāṃ yadi paro vākyānumādito nivṛttyabhāvaniścayaḥ syāditi brūyāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:13463: yadi vā ākasmikottarakṣaṇe pralayaśaṅkāpādane vākyānumāditaḥ parameśvarecchādinaiva syāditi manyeta,
GSP33nysu__1u:13464: yadi ca vākyānumāditaḥ saṃsāranivṛttiḥ syāditi vadet,
GSP33nysu__1u:13465: tadā tasya vākyādeḥ prāmāṇyaṃ kena niścitamiti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13466: sākṣītareṇetyaṅgīkāre jñānasya sākṣivedyatvena parataḥ prāmāṇyagrahāpatteḥ sākṣiṇaiveti vaktavyam / *4,583*
GSP33nysu__1u:13468: sākṣī kiṃ brahmasatyatvādipratipādakānāṃ vākyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tātkālikameva gṛhṇāti kiṃvā'tyantikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13477: tasya brahmasatyatvādipratipādakavākyādeḥ prāmāṇyaṃ yathā sākṣī vartamānakālīnaṃ sthāpayati gṛhṇāti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13482: na kevalaṃ brahmasatyatvatvādivākyādiprāmāṇyaṃ sākṣī tātkālikaṃ gṛhṇāti kintvātyantikamevetyarthaḥ / *4,584*
GSP33nysu__1u:13487: sarvakāleṣvapīdamevameva na kadāpi viṣayāpahāralakṣaṇaṃ bādhamāpnotīti vyabhicāramapohya tata eva sthairyeṇa gṛhṇātīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13490: ata eva tadviṣayamapi brahmādikaṃ sarvakāleṣvapi sthairyādatiśayena vyabhicāramapohyaiva sthāpayatīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13494: ayaṃ sākṣī yadi tatsatyamityādipramāṇaprāmāṇyamātyantikaṃ gṛhṇan tadviṣayasya brahmādestraikālikābādhyatvaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:13506: viśvaviṣayasyākṣajādestu tātkālikameveti kiṃ na syādityata āha- nirdoṣeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13508: tatsatyamityādijñānasyātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇāti sākṣītyatra kiṃ nimittam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13509: jñānaṃ gṛhṇan tasya nirdoṣatāyāṃ prāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇātīti sākṣiṇaḥ svabhāvo 'yamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:13510: kathaṃ tarhyakṣajāderapi ātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13513: athavā kiṃ sākṣī kutrāpi prāmāṇyamātyantikaṃ grahītuṃ na śaknoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13545: bahūnāmīśvarasya tatpreritānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ ca jñānecchāprayatnairnimittatve śrutyādipramāṇasadbhāvena tadviruddhatvācceti / *4,591*
GSP33nysu__1u:13546: kiñcaikajīvājñānaparikalpitaṃ jīvajaḍātmakaṃ samastamiti vadanpraṣṭavyaḥ kimasāveko jīvastvam utānya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13555: yaḥ parasya prativādyādeḥ satyatāṃ jānannapi paro nāstīti vadati /
GSP33nysu__1u:13557: svātmānamiva paramapi satyatayā paśyato 'hameka eva satyo madajñānakalpitāḥ sarve jīvā jaḍāśceti vacanaṃ svānubhavaviruddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13563: tathā cāniścayena na mokṣārthā pravṛttiḥ syāditi / *4,592*
GSP33nysu__1u:13572: anyathonmattavannāyaṃ laukiko nāpi parīkṣaka ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13578: parābhāve ca tadvaiyarthyādvayarthyāṃ vācaṃ na prayuñjīta /
GSP33nysu__1u:13581: mayāpi kimapi nocyata ityata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13585: mayā kimapi kadāpi naivocyata iti yadyucyate tadā svakriyāvirodhiśraḥ sakalalokāvagatārthāpalāpinastasya taskarasyaiva daṇḍa evocito na pratyuttaram
GSP33nysu__1u:13587: tatkiṃ pratīyogyabhāve niścite vyavahārato 'pi vadantaḥ prekṣāvanto bhavanti,
GSP33nysu__1u:13594: tatra tāvatprapañco yadi vidyetetyādivākyadvayaṃ paṭhitvā parābhimate 'rthe 'nupapattimāha- prapañca iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13595: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13598: upadeśādayaṃ vādo 'jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate // MAnuv_1,4.108 //
GSP33nysu__1u:13599: ityatra yadiśabdau ca nivarteteti ca dvayam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13602: nanvatra sūtragṛhītatayā pareṇopāttānāṃ śrutīnāmanupapattyādikaṃ prathamatā vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13610: ityatra ślokadvaye yadiśabdadvayaṃ nivarteteti liṅprayogadvayaṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:13619: dhitsitaṃ syāttadā yo 'yaṃ prapañco vidyata iva dṛśyate sa nivartiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13620: ajñānena kalpito vikalpo vinivartiṣyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13623: yadi parvato niragniko bhavet tarhi nirdhūmo 'pi syāditi yathā / *4,597*
GSP33nysu__1u:13624: prasaṅgasya ca viparyaye paryavasānādanivṛttyādikameva vākyasāmarthyāllabhyata iti parakīyamarthamapākurvataiva śrutitātparyaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13646: atra hi prapañco yadi vidyeta tarhi nivarteteti yadiśabdādibalātprasaṅgo 'yamiti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13662: keyaṃ sattā nāmānugatarūpā vā svarūpameva vā nādyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13665: abhāve tadbhāvasyāstyabhāvo 'sti ca dhvaṃsa ityādau vakṣyamāṇatvāditi / *4,602*
GSP33nysu__1u:13673: ata eva tarkāṅgabhūtamāpādyasyāniṣṭatvaṃ ca nopapadyata ityataḥ prapañcaśabdamanyathā vyācaṣṭe- prapañca iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13679: pañcaśatau varge veti vāśabdena pañcaśabdasyāpi nipātanāṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13691: naca kadāpi padārthānāmanyonyaṃ tādātmyamastītyanityānāmapi bhedo nitya eveti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13699: mithaśca jaḍabhedo yaḥ prapañco bhedapañcakaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.111 //
GSP33nysu__1u:13706: so 'yaṃ satyo hyanādiścetyanena atrāpi pratijñādvayaṃ bahireva kartavyamiti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13712: dvaitaṃ na vidyata iti tasmādajñānināṃ matam // MAnuv_1,4.112cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:13719: māṅ māne traiṅ pālana ityābhyāṃ ghaña'rthe kavidhānamiti karmaṇi kapratyaye mātramiti bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:13720: dhātudvayādapyekaḥ pratyayaḥ adibhūbhyāṃ ḍutac adbhutamityādau dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13733: pūrvaśloke 'nādimāyayā parameśvaraprajñayā tadicchayā vā jīvajātasya prakṛtyādijaḍāvṛtajñānatvalakṣaṇaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:13737: prabhoricchayā nigaḍādinā puruṣe baddhe mukte vā bheda(traya)darśanāt / *4,620*
GSP33nysu__1u:13744: tatra tāvadanāditvaṃ vipakṣe bādhakapradarśanenopapādayati- prapañca iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13745: yadi ca jaḍajīvabhedo nivarteta tadā jīvānāṃ jaḍatvāpattyā mokṣaśāstravaiyarthyamityādirūpeṇa nivartetetyasyāniṣṭatvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13765: vikalpaḥ prakṛto bhedo yadi kenacidajñānādinā kalpitaḥ syāttarhi candrabhedavannivarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:13773: dvaitaṃ na vidyata iti tu tattve 'jñāte sati bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:13775: adhunā pariṇāmavādinā vivartavādinā ca pratijñādṛṣṭā tānuparodhāditi sūtrārthatayā gṛhītām“uta tamādeśamaprākṣa';
GSP33nysu__1u:13779: itrata jagato brahmapariṇāmatayā tato 'nantvābhiprāyeṇa tadvijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñātam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13780: tatra sarvasya brahmopādānatāmajānatā upādānopādeyayorapi bhedaṃ manyamānena śvetaketunā anyajñāne satyanyajñānasya kvāpyadarśanāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13782: iti codite jagato brahmopādānatayā tadananyatvamupadekṣyan laukikapratītisiddhaṃ kāraṇātkāryasyānanyatvaṃ,
GSP33nysu__1u:13783: tajjñānena tajjñānaṃ ca darśayati-“yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13785: yathā somyaikena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13786: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ lohamaṇirityeva satyam yathā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13787: somyaikena nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13788: vācā'rambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ kārṣṇāyasamityeva satyam'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13789: yathaikamṛtpiṇḍādipariṇāmānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ tadananyayā tajjñānena jñātateti dṛṣṭāntatrayārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13794: nāmadheyaṃ tadabhidhānamiti kumbhādervācyasya tadvācakānāṃ ca svarūpakāryavyapadeśādibhedātparasparaṃ bhedo vāstava ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13795: etairhetubhiḥ parasparaṃ bhedaścetkāraṇādapi taireva bheda iti pūrvapakṣaṃ niṣeddhumāha- mṛttiketyeva satyamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13797: yatprakāreṇa yatsattayā mṛttikā satī tatprakāreṇaiva mṛṇmayaṃ satyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13800: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya dṛṣṭāntākāṅkṣāyāmucyate- yathā somyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13802: ekena mṛtpiṇḍena paramārthato mṛdātmanā vijñātena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ mṛdātmakatvāviśeṣādvijñātaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:13808: mṛttiketyeva satyamityeṣa brahmaṇo dṛṣṭānta āmnāta iti / *4,630*
GSP33nysu__1u:13813: vācārabdhaṃ tu sāṅketyaṃ nāma syād ... // MAnuv_1,4.114ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:13816: lyuṭ ca bhāve karaṇādhikaraṇayośca vihito na karmaṇi naca“kṛtyalluṭo bahulam';
GSP33nysu__1u:13825: “ṭāpaṃ cāpi halantānāṃ yathā vācā niśā diśā';
GSP33nysu__1u:13830: vācārambhaṇaśabdādeva vikāratvalābhādvikāra iti punaruktaṃ syādatastātparyamāha- sāṅketyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13833: yathā caṣṭe 'neneti cakṣuriti nirvacanalabhyeti darśanakāraṇatve cakṣuṣā paśyatīti noktārthatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13839: anena vikriyata iti vikāra iti karmaṇi ghañityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:13842: nityaṃ tu nāmadheyaṃ yanmṛttiketyādi vaidikam // MAnuv_1,4.114cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:13847: yanmṛttiketyādi saṃskṛtaṃ nāmadheyam tadeva nityamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13862: yadā tu vācā yasyārambhaṇaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ vikāro janimaditi,
GSP33nysu__1u:13865: vikāritvādutpattivināśavaditi yāvaditi vā granthāntaroktā yojanā, tadā(tu)
GSP33nysu__1u:13882: tatra yathā prādhānyātsaṃskṛtajñānamātreṇa sāṅketikaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:13884: evamanityatvādināpradhānasya devatākarmādimiśrasya sakalasyāpi jagato jñānena yatphalaṃ tatsamastamapi nityatvādinā pradhānasya paramātmano jñānāllabhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13899: sadātanaṃ satyamiti nirvacanena satyamiti padena nityamucyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:13911: ke satyaśabdasya nityatva eva prayogaścāstīti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13912: tameva prayogaṃ darśayituṃ“yadainaṃ jarāvāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā kiṃ tato '(syāti)
GSP33nysu__1u:13913: vaśiṣyata iti sa brūyānnāsya jarayaitajjīyarte na vadhenāsya hanyate etatsatyaṃ brahmapuram';
GSP33nysu__1u:13917: hanyate na vadhenāyaṃ jarayā ca na jīryati // MAnuv_1,4.117 //
GSP33nysu__1u:13918: etat satyaṃ brahmapuramiti nityatva eva hi // MAnuv_1,4.118ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:13920: yadainaṃ dehaṃ jarāvāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vāyaṃ dehaḥ, (tadā)
GSP33nysu__1u:13921: tatastadasya dehasyāntargataḥ paramātmā dahyamānagehāntargatagaganavatkimatiśiṣyate kiṃvā paṭādivannaśyatīti pṛṣṭe,
GSP33nysu__1u:13926: atrāpi satyaśabdaḥ kuto nityārtha ityata āha- nityatva eva hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13931: etadeva spaṣṭīkartumetatsatyaṃ brahmapuramityetāvati paṭhitavye pūrvavākyamapi paṭhitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13933: brahmaṇo jarāvadhayorabhāve satyatvaṃ hetutvenocyata iti cet / na /
GSP33nysu__1u:13937: jarādyupetānāṃ dehānāmasatyatvāsyāsiddheḥ asatyānāṃ ca śuktirajatādīnāṃ jarādyabhāvena vyatirekasyāpyabhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13945: tathāpi pratiśabdaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkaraṇe 'paryavasānaprasakterupalakṣaṇatve caikenāpi kṛtatvācchabdatrayopādānamanupapannamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:13957: kiṃ rūḍhimāśritya vācārambhaṇamityasya mithyeti vyākhyānaṃ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13965: vācā kevalamārabhyate vikāro na tu vastuvṛttenāstīti vyākhyāne mithyātvaṃ labhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:13966: yataḥ śrutyā vācārambhaṇamityevokte kevalaśabdaprakṣepeṇa mithyeti vyākhyāne 'śrutakalpanameveti / *4,648*
GSP33nysu__1u:13974: atha vikāro nāmadheyaṃ ca dvayamapi vācārambhaṇamiti vyākhyānaṃ,
GSP33nysu__1u:13992: iti mṛttikārthe prāpte tatparihāreṇa śabdasvarūpagrahaṇārthaṃ tadupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13993: pariṇāmavādino 'pi kṛdyoge tṛtīyāyā aṅgīkṛtatvāt lyuṭaḥ karmaṇi vyākhyātatvādvācārambhaṇaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:14001: tatra yatsattayā mṛttikā satī tayaiva mṛṇmayaṃ satyamiti vyācakṣāṇena vaktavyam,
GSP33nysu__1u:14014: idānīṃ yathā somyetyādīni dṛṣṭāntavākyāni svamatena vyākariṣyanparakīyavyākhyāyāṃ tāvaddoṣamāha- eka iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14015: ekaḥ piṇḍo maṇiśceti padavaiyathyarmeva ca // MAnuv_1,4.119cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:14023: jagato brahmavikāratvena tadāropitatvena caikavijñānena sarvavijñāne vivakṣite mṛdā vijñātayā mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:14025: kṛṣṇāyasā vijñātena kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syādityetāvatā pūrṇatvāttrayāṇāmekaśabdānāṃ piṇḍamaṇinakhanikṛntanaśabdānāṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ ca vigatāthartvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:14035: nanvakeneti paramākāraṇasyaikatvaṃ piṇḍeneti kāryābhimukhyaṃ sarvamiti kāryanānātvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:14049: yadyatra dṛṣṭāntatraye na vikāravivartavivakṣā kiṃ tarhi vivakṣitamityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14051: vivakṣātra tu nityatve prādhānye coktavartmanā // MAnuv_1,4.121ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:14056: nityatvaṃ prādhānyopapādakameva na tu svatantramekavijñānena sarvavijñānasyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:14065: asmākaṃ tu kāryakāraṇabhāvādiprapañcārthatvena astyupayoga ityata āha- prādhānyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14068: ādipadena pralaye 'vasthānaṃ trivṛtkaraṇaṃ jīvarūpeṇa praveśanamityādikaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:14071: tatpratipattyarthaṃ sṛṣṭayādeḥ pratipādaka eva granthavistaraḥ pravṛtto 'taḥ kathamasaṅgatiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:14081: tasmāt kenāpi mārgeṇa na vivartamataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.122ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:14118: kīdṛśaṃ tarhi janmādisūtre 'bhitihamityata āha- tata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14124: vicitrānekakāryakartṛtve śramādidoṣāḥ prasajyanta ityata uktam- aśrama iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14131: evamasminnadhyāye parabrahmaṇi nārāyaṇe pratipāditasya sakalaśrutisamanvayasya phalaṃ janmādisūtroditalakṣaṇasiddhimupasaṃharati- pūrṇeti //
